A GLOBAL DIGITAL CREATIVE TEAM TO CONVERT YOUR CREATIVITY TO CASHNow that you know DIGILIB 3D uses the worldwide Library  Information Model (LIMO) you already understand, you can finally convert your CREATIVITY TO CASH using the many examples of Digital Revenue Oriented Products we provide below. The DIGILIB 3D Team has carefully selected a series of PERKS to EMPOWER you and get you started as quickly and easily as possible based on your lifetime experience with using academic, private and public libraries..  Libraries are an integral part of the Digital Urban Social Environment. No need to spend years at some expensive technical college  to learn something you can already master or over stay your time in any institution not in touch with Digital Urban Social Empowerment. DIGILIB 3D Teams are spread across the Americas, Africa, Asia and Europe. Every group brings such a rich multicultural flavor to our creative science pool that we know we can  help morph your creative mind into blockbuster digital products based on our Digital M4 Methodology (MAKE,MANAGE, MARKET, MONETIZE) of rapid development through monetization.We are Creative Scientists  and having spent years bridging the digital gap between technology and  the best in the creative world, from photographers to videographers, journalist to editors, writers to publishers,  musicians to songwriters,  filmmakers to scriptwriters,, TV producers to Advertising Directors, the Digital M4 Methodology is by far the best way to convert your CREATIVITY into CASH. This is because we can provide you with DIGISMART SMEs (Subject Matter Experts) instead of techie's or programmers to  get your project running. This is based on the UN MDG Goal #8, Global Partnerships. THE BEST EX-TEAM TO DIGITALLY TRANSFORM THE GLOBAL CREATIVE ECONOMY BASED ON UN MDG GOALSTo make DIGILIB 3D the most socially responsible, environmentally friendly, culturally diverse and economically sustainable Digital 3D Interactive Multimedia platform in the world, we continue to  put together the best, brightest, bravest, boldest and most beautiful EX-Team on the planet. This includes our EX-CELLENT CORE CREATIVE DIGILIB 3D GLOBAL TEAM and some EX-ceptionally talented EX-corporate friends, family, fans and financial gurus (ex-IBM, ex-Bell Labs, ex-AT&T, ex-Nielsen, ex-Silicon Valley, ex-Hollywood, ex-Broadcast, ex-Wall Street, ex-Fashion Ave , ex-Madison Ave, ex-cetera) who share our beliefs that we can make the world a better place by empowering creative "right brain" geniuses like you with the latest Digital 3D Interactive Multimedia Technology.  DIGISMART SME Programs are designed to create new Digital Entrepreneurs and Employees all over the world, especially in urban innercity communities where unbridled creativity abounds... but with no revenue oriented methodology to manage, market and monetize it to the benefit of the creative content owner or custodian. YOUR DIGISMART ADVANTAGE

DIGITAL Scholars Motivated to Achieve using Raw Talent(DIGISMART)

DIGITAL Subject Matter  Application Related Technologist(DIGISMART)


Having spent some of our formative years as technologists or consultants at Multinational IT companies such as IBM, BELL LABS, AT&T, REUTERS, NIELSEN, ADOBE and in Wall Street firms, many of us on the DIGILIB 3D Team know very well how the  high costs or lack of enough affordable experienced technical developers and support has stifled the development of more innovative products and services for global industries which have depended on input and advice from Global  Creative Economy for decades.

DIGILIB 3D 's social empowerment objective is to develop a new generation of "right-brain" Digitally SMART (DIGISMART) Entrepreneurs, Employees and Employers from the Global Creative Economy based on their raw talent and experience in related subject matters.. Avoid critical dependence  for expensive computer programmers, techies and geeks who are more Left Brain Logic than Right Brain Random and seldom speak your cool creative language.. 
Need help on developing your project?. Call in a DIGISMART SME or team digitally or physically. They are Subject Matter Experts and will know what you are doing or want to do because that is what they have done or are doing. No technical talk, unless you insist. We even provide a DIGISMART PERK to get you started on your own DIGIBOOK or DIGIZINE project.
This is the first digital ecosystem that comes with Digital Subject Matter Experts in addition to Social Media Experts,  animators, cartoonists, video editors, voice over pecialists, music engineers, writers, advertising experts, marketing and sales experts. So PERK yourself up with a DIGISMART SME Training Workshop right here in fabulous Times Square... or digitally from where you are.. If you want to help to change the world for the better and provide jobs to urban innercity communities, you can kindly PERK up some talented creative genius in the USA, across the Americas, Africa, Europe and Asia. This helps to support UN MDG Goal #1 and at the same time bring the power of the Global Creative Economy  to less fortunate communities that can rise up and support each other and their entire state or country. But most importantly, in 2015 and beyond we can all help to execute UN Millennium Development Goals (UN MDG) of Poverty Eradication, Universal Education, Gender Equality, Reduction of Child Mortality, Promotion of Maternal Health,  Prevention of Infectious Diseases (such as HIV/AIDS, Malaria and Ebola, plus the common cold that has morphed into uncommon killer flus even in some parts of the USA), Environmental Sustainability and Global Partnerships.  CREATE SOPHISTICATED DIGITAL PRODUCTS WITH  SIMPLE EX-AMPLESOur DIGILIB 3D EX-Team Members are living up to their core beliefs in the Power of the UN MDG Global Partnerships in Creativity based on the  mantra of the great creative guru Leonardo Da Vinci: "Simplicity is the ultimate EX-ample of Sophistication".  DIGILIB 3D is a simple Digital Interactive Simulation or example of a real Library, which in itself is a sophisticated organization of information that is simple to understand because of examples of books, magazines, newspapers, maps, research papers, DVDs, CDs, audio tapes on shelves, book cases, etc..AMAZING INTERACTIVE VIEWING EXPERIENCE OF DIGILIB 3D 
Here comes an increasingly important Innovation of Things that can be used by many industries In our many years of field testing DIGILIB 3D across the globe, one simple Digital Interactive Visual Appliance (DIVA) got WOWs after WOWs from the Creative Community: the DIGILENS, a working simulation  of the conventional magnifying glass used in libraries to read fine print, magnify maps, diagrams or photos. Well we took the creative technology even further  to the final frontier :VIDEO DIGILENS.  

It is amazing what application of real life information consumption tools such as DIGILENS can do to the elevation of interest in any content. To dynamically place magnifying lens over live or recorded video while in motion is a virtually impossible scientific task that not too many video programming tech gurus have figured out, far less build and implement. You don't see it in YouTube, nor Vimeo, Netflix, Hulu, HBO GO,Microsoft Media Player or Google. Not even in Apple Macbook, Ipad or iPhone.

 Think of how many business, scientific, medical, entertainment  and  scholastic applications one can build with DIGILENS, DIGIBOOKS, DIGIGAME and  DIGITV working together with DIGILIB 3D. This is the Global Creative Economy morphing into Digital Creative Science.THE TIMES SQUARE DIGIPEDIA From Ball Drop to Ball Drop, the TIMES SQUARE DIGIPEDIA will be a living history  of the WHO'S WHO, WHERE'S WHERE, WHAT'S WHAT, WHEN'S WHEN  with the HOW and WHY these exciting activities occur in this #1 TOURIST DESTINATION and in the #1 TV MARKET in the USA.... surrounded by ABC, MTV, BET, VH1, NICKELODEON and a host of other Entertainment and Media Studios. PERK YOURSELF UP WITH THE LARGEST AND MOST EXPENSIVE DIGITAL ADVERTISING DISPLAY IN THE WORLDIn November 2014, the Marriott Marquis Hotel in Times Square and some of "the Multimedia Mavens of Madison Avenue"  installed the largest and most expensive Digital Advertising Display in the world. (24 million pixels covering 8 stories high and 1.25 City Blocks wide on Broadway, rented by Google at around $625,000 weekly). Now this has become one of the biggest Tourist attractions to the 300,000 pedestrians coming through the park daily as Google Maps showed off incredible wide angle vistas of Harlem, Brooklyn, Manhattan  and humongous images of the New York Harbor with the Statue of Liberty in all its glory..BUILDING REVENUE ORIENTED PRODUCTS AND SERVICES WITH DIGILIB 3D With DIGILIB 3D, you dont have to subscribe to the entire DIGIPEDIA, just the volumes you are interested it. Check them out with your DIGILIB LIBRARY CARD. CHECK IT OUT! You can build your own private library from the millions of DIGIBOOKS, DIGIZINES, DIGIMOVIES, DIGITV PROGRAMS and other DIGI products that will be in DIGILIB 3D, by simply checking them out into your Private DIGILIB at Home or at Work (or at School)... even while travelling. When you are done, just check them back in. Simple. Just like a college library or a public library.PERK YOURSELF UP WITH A DIGILIB LIBRARY CARD:BRONZE, SILVER, GOLD, PLATINUM,, BLACK.DIGILIB 3D - A SUPER NETWORK OF DIGITAL INTERACTIVE NETWORKSIts like combining a Multilingual, Multicultural Core with  a Digital Book-Magazine-Newspaper Publishing Network,  a Digital TV Network , a Digital Music Network, a Digital Movie Network, a Digital Community Cinema Network and  a Digital Education Administration Network (DEAN) built on a Digital Commercial, Advertising and Sales Hub(DIGICASH) that makes a true revenue generating ecosystem.  TIMES SQUARE - THE PERFECT DIGITAL STORM FOR DIGILIB 3DTimes Square is the PERFECT DIGITAL STORM that triggers this rapidly growing new DIGITAL DOLLAR WAVE . This is the boiling cauldron of the Creative Convergence Zone that empowers the new Digital Urban World.  This wave will rush down Manhattan's Silicon Alley from Broadway to Fashion Ave straight to wherever you operate in the Global Creative Economy, especially in countries like the USA, UK, Brazil, Japan, Spain, France and Canada where over 75% of the population has moved to urban areas..  The DIGILIB 3D Team also uses this TIMES SQUARE DIGIPEDIA as a hands on training tool in our DIGITAL INTERACTIVE MEDIA EDUCATION (DIME) for those smart and lucky enough to come to our exciting training workshops in Times Square (See the PERKS). You learn quickly and easily by having fun while immersing yourself into Times Square's organized chaos of digital creativity, producing real DIGIBOOKS and DIGIZINES and understanding by example how Digital Interactive TV programs are produced for Times Square Digital TV Network that will also be based on DIGILIB 3D. Meet some great creative people from around the world who also come here for the WOW in learning by doing.Remember you will be operating in the same Times Square plaza where MTV, VH1, NICKELODEON, ABC and many other Entertainment and Media companies from the USA and around the world produce their daily, weekly or monthly programs. In fact, you will be able to see how shows like ABC's Good Morning America is produced if you can wake up early enough after some exciting nights going to Broadway shows or indulging in Times Square Night life. NASDAQ -A WEALTHY NEIGHBOR OUTSIDE THE DIGILIB 3D STUDIO WINDOWThe Digital Dollar Wave flows right through the NASDAQ Stock Exchange with its towering Digital Advertising Display hovering over a multicultural melting pot of 55 million annual tourists and 300,000 pedestrians per day from all over the world.But, most importantly to the Global Creative Economy, the NASDAQ is where some of the top revenue generating companies in the $4 Trillion Global Information Technology Industry, such as APPLE, AMAZON, MICROSOFT, GOOGLE, FACEBOOK, INTEL, ADOBE, EBAY,CISCO and YAHOO, converge with some of the most successful corporations in the $4 Trillion Global Entertainment and Media Industry,  such as COMCAST, DISH, NETFLIX, FOX, GOPRO, VIACOM (MTV, VH1, BET, COMEDY CENTRAL, etc.), to raise trillions of dollars in public capital to convert their creativity to cash. Many of these technology companies started with a vision which was then nurtured in Silicon Valley, but it is the financial power of the NASDAQ in Times Square, the wave maker at the top of  Silicon Alley,  that fuels their fortune. As a PERK for the curious Investment Creativity in you we have included the above Investment and Banking DIGIBOOK as one of the volumes of the TIMES SQ DIGIPEDIA. The Investment and Banking DIGIBOOK shows many of the new NASDAQ listed companies, their executives and main investors as they stand in awe of themselves  in Times Square plaza looking up at their photos and video clips, or company TV commercials on the giant NASDAQ screen on the day of the IPO. PERK YOURSELF UP WITH THE DIGISMART WAY OF CONVERTING YOUR CREATIVITY TO CASHWant to be a champion of the new DIGITAL INTERACTIVE SOCIAL PUBLISHING DOLLAR WAVE?. With DIGILIB 3D, your creative juices can create content that can be expressed in many different revenue generating ways. A DIGILIB 3D Network can contain DIGIBOOKS, DIGIZINES, DIGICARDS, DIGIMUSIC , DIGITV, DIGIMOVIES and a wide array of other Digitally Interactive Products and Services that can be mixed, matched, merged, marketed and monetized. The following DIGIBOOK example contains elements of a DIGIZINE, DIGIMUSIC, DIGICASH DIGITAN (Tourism Advancement Network), DIGICARDS (DANCING) and DIGITV. The Dancing DIGIBOOK is to capture the attention of the Reader as it moves to the groove of the DIGIMUSIC Video. Great for Children Books, Tourism Guides and Cultural Brochures.We currently have over 25 DIGI products and services based on DIGILIB 3D, all of which can communicate with each other. DIGILIB 3Dgoes beyond  Platform, Cloud, Network or Operating System. It is a Digital 3D Ecosystem , a Network of Networks, with a Synaptic Online Universal Language that can generate an infinite number of Digital Interactive Visual Applications (DIVA). E-BOOKS NOT E-NOUGHFrom Industry Research Reports, the E-Book Market is now about $15 Billion and Growing at 17% CAGR  and will try to dominate Global Book Publishing Industry With 27.8% Share by 2019 . However, when compared to the $400 Billion  Global Publishing Industry and the $4 Trillion Entertainment and Media Industry , plus the ubiquitous $4.4 Trillion Global Education Market, the E-Book Market of $15 Billon is miniscule. DIGIBOOKS goes way beyond E-BOOKS because it is part of an integrated Digital Interactive Library Ecosystem consistung of Digital TV, Digital Interactive Music, Movies, Magazines and Digital Interactive Games that can all talk to each other.. All   that content can be dynamically repurpose as TV programs in  a Digital Book or Games in a Page of a Book, without having to re-author the book. In this way DIGIBOOKS can be used at live program Guides for TV Channels or networks. E-Books cannot do that. Yet DIGIBOOKS can read the same EPUB XML files that makes an E-BOOK an EBOOK.  FIGHT CLIMATE CHANGE WITH DIGITAL INTERACTIVE SOCIAL PUBLISHINGDigital Interactive Social Publishing is a brand new area of publishing. Because you are not bounded by physical media with the inherent limitations that precludes the proliferation of your literary works, a DIGIBOOK, DIGIZINE, DIGIPEDIA, DIGICARD, DIGIMUSIC or DIGIMOVIE publication can be distributed across communities, cities, countries, continent and cultures in various languages and localized styles. Here is a great opportunity to plant your own SEED in the fertile soils of the new Digital Global Creative Economy. You can MAKE a SEED  out of your creative ideas and soul  following the guidelines here and we will show you how to MANAGE, MARKET and MONETIZE it through DIGILIB 3D. We can provide DIGISMART SMEs to assist you along the way. Your Digital Publication or Product must be: 
S-OCIALLY RESPONSIBLE
E-NVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY
E-CONOMICALLY SUSTAINABLE
D-IGITALLY INTERACTIVE
Start off with a Sample Publication and test it with your friends, fans, family, firm faculty members or members of your faith. Now is the time to start MAKING a SEED out of your burning creativity and watch it grow into a DIGITAL TREE. Let it produce the flowers or fruits of your knowledge, innovation or inspiration that can spread quickly. In the Digital Innovation of Things, the winds of change will carry your digital publication to DIGILIB 3D Library Members or Guestsor within a click, tap or touch of billions of curious fingertips with eyes, ears and lips across the fields of the next generation of Digital Urban Social Media. You may have photos, videos, sketches, manuscripts or scrap books of creative ideas you have been trying to develop into a product such as a book, magazine, card, PERK UP YOUR DIGITAL INTERACTIVE SOCIAL PUBLISHING POWER WITH OUR EMPOWERMENT GIFT CARDS (UNDER PERKS)Select this DIGIZINE PUBLISHER Gift Scratch Off Card Perk if you want to publish a sample Digital Interactive Magazine, Catalog or NewspaperSelect this DIGIBOOK PUBLISHER Gift Scratch Off Card Perk if you want to publish a sample Book,  Encyclopedia Volume,  Training Manual, College TextbookSelect this DIGICARD PUBLISHER Scratch Off Gift Card Perk if you want to publish Digital Interactive Multimedia Greeting Cards, Brochures, Business Cards, Invitation Cards, Posters, Coupons, Gift Cards, Scratch Off CardsSelect this CREATIVE TALENT  Gift Scratch Off Card Perk if you need creative talent such as Writers, Singers, Illustrators,, Poets,Voice Over Narrators, Animators, Videographers, Photographers, Video Editors, Editors, Artists, etc to enhance the Making, Management, Marketability and Monetization of Your DIGIBOOK, DIGIZINE or DIGICARDSelect this DIGISMART D.I.M.E.S (Digital Interactive Multimedia Education Services)  Gift Scratch Off Card Perk to qualify forDIGILIB 3D approved  talent such as TV Producers, DIVA DESIGNERS, ,Voice Over Narrators, Animators, Videographers, Photographers, Video Editors, Editors, Artists, etc Keep Checking Back for Frequent Updates and  more Empowering S.E.E.D. PERKS. TIMES SQ DIGIPEDIA UPDATES ON THE FABULOUS 2015 NEW YEAR'S EVE BALL DROP AND FIREWORKS IN SWEDISH, SPANISH, ENGLISH directly through our Times SQ Studio Windows way above the plaza.. See rare above the scenes panoramic  video clips of Celebrities like Taylor Swift greeting special guests and  other celebrities .

story:
Fret Fu is scale mastery, improvisation mastery, and composition mastery!

Even if you "know" this scale and all the others, this will give you an entirely different perspective on the whole fretboard as well as music theory in general. It will change  how you view and play your instrument. You will become more proficient and connected with the flow. Once you know, you can't go back. 

Why do you need to know scales? Scales are the roadmap to creating melodies and building chords. If someone asked you  how to get around in your neighborhood, you’d be able to give them accurate detailed directions without thinking twice about it because you know it so well. That’s what knowing scales will do. Now, Imagine if you were able to drive them there while wearing a blindfold. That’s what this method will do.

-You can apply this theory to Guitar, Bass, Mandolin, Ukulele, Banjo, Violin, Cello, and all stringed instruments while wearing a blindfold. You will also be able to apply it to Piano, and all other instruments because of the complete understanding of music theory you will obtain. 

- You’ll be able to hear and sing notes before you even play them. Writing melodies as you drive down the road in your car. Your singing will improve dramatically as a result as well. 

-This method blows any other method away and it doesn’t take a 300 page book or 16 DVD set to do it!  Who has time for that? There’s no sight reading, tablature, or draw out diagrams of black dots on top of white lines like you always see in just about every other method out there. In fact there’s nothing on paper at all. It’s right here in this video. In under 30 minutes!

- Learn how to connect with a zen like flow and play effortlessly across the entire fretboard 

-Much like typing or using a video game controller, you’ll be able to control your every note without looking or thinking. This is what is called “Hand- Ear” coordination and it is one of the many things you will take from this method. 

-Once you earn your Black Belt in Pentatonic-Blues Scale Mastery Volume 1, you  can take it to another level with “Diatonic Scale Mastery Volume 2” Where you’ll learn all the notes on the fretboard as well as all the “Nashville Numbers” and the names of all seven modes of the Diatonic Scale. Allowing you to effectively communicate with other professional musicians in the industry without having to rack up student loans for a degree that you don’t need in order to understand music theory and become a successful professional musician on any instrument. 

-You don't play an instrument, you are an instrument. You only use instruments outside of yourself to express yourself through it. If you have to look at the instrument in order to play it, the instrument is playing you.

-When the student is ready, the teacher will appear. Then you will become the teacher. Once you know, you can never go back. This will make you become addicted to playing! You won’t want to set your guitar down! You’ll see….


    The Impact


    • Pre purchases and donations go to a great cause. Muse 4 Change is a non profit that helps less than fortunate kids get access to instruments and other tools for artistic creation. 
    • Learn hand/ear coordination that enables you to play your instrument like a video game controller while wearing a blindfold. 
    • Graduate through different levels of testing and become a master with a black belt in Fret Fu! Once you learn, you can’t go back.
    • Learn this method so well that you can teach others how to become a master of any stringed instrument. If you can’t explain it simply, you don’t know it well enough.
    • Learn how to trademark your own style with this newfound information that frees you from relying on other players’ licks. 
    • Be able to hear/sing every note or phrase in your head before playing it on your instrument.
    • Master a complete understanding of music that transfers to EVERY instrument.
    • Remove your fears. Never be afraid of hitting  a wrong note again 
    The method that you will learn here not only teaches you how to play any stringed instrument, but it teaches you how to understand music in general on any platform. Once you know the chromatic, diatonic, pentatonic, diminished, scales etc, and sing along as you play, you will become so familiar with the notes, you will have an understanding like never before. You will become the instrument that you already are. 


    What We Need & What You Get


    Right now, for only $19 we are giving away this system for the first 101 people that back us during this campaign. We need reviews! Please let us know what you think. Once this is over, we will be raising the price to $99...

    You will get Pentatonic/Blues Scale Mastery Vol. 1

    By the end of this video you will be able to play the Pentatonic Scale in any key while wearing a blindfold. We guarantee it! 


    Risks & Challenges

    • There is no risk. I've been working on this for ten years and the video is ready to go. Just make a donation and receive it via digital download when the campaign is over and become a master. It's as easy as that. I know there are many systems out there for teaching and I will be under a ton of scrutiny from other peers and teachers, and this motivates me to deliver something extraordinary. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • If you can't contribute financially, perhaps you wouldn't mind sharing this with your community. We are excited about this and hope you see our vision as well. All you have to do is hit the share button. 
    • If you have any suggestions on what we are doing here, and any ways you think we may be able to make it better, please share those with us as well.

story:
L'idée : un café associatif, dédié au paganisme et à ses adeptes, offrant un lieu de rencontre, de partage et d'échanges autour du paganisme, de l'ésotérisme et de la spiritualité.

Welcome to all english speaking visitors ! To see the english version of this project, please click here, you'll find a pdf document with the translation of the folowing presentation. And do not hesitate to share this page, the more we'll be seen, the more chances we have to reach our goal ;)

Le Paganisme en France

Bien que plusieurs traditions païennes soient reconnues à travers l'Europe, la France reste encore frileuse sur ce point.

Pourtant la communauté païenne française est bien présente. En faisant un rapide tour des réseaux sociaux (faute d'outil de statistique plus élaboré), on peut estimer le nombre de pratiquant(e)s païen(ne)s à environ 10 000 personnes. Les traditions les plus représentées étant le Druidisme, l'Asatrù, l'Hellénisme, et la Wicca.

Cependant, être païen(ne) en France, n'est pas chose facile ; ces traditions étant la plupart du temps, méconnues et dépréciées par le grand public, les pratiquant(e)s de ces diverses traditions sont souvent isolé(e)s.
C'est de ce constat qu'est née l'idée du Pagan Café : offrir un lieu de rencontre, d'échange et de découverte tant pour les païen(ne)s que pour les non-païen(ne)s, dans le respect et l'acceptation de l'autre.

Le Pagan Café, qu'est ce que c'est ?

Le Pagan Café sera un lieu de rencontre pour tous les païen(ne)s de toutes traditions ; un lieu pour partager, échanger, discuter, en toute amitié, autour d'une pinte, d'un muffin ou d'une tisane.

Un espace à la fois convivial et chaleureux, qui offre une véritable opportunité pour rencontrer d'autres païen(ne)s et sympathisant(e)s dans une ambiance confortable et relaxante.

Le projet est d’ouvrir le Pagan Café dans le centre de Paris, au quatrième trimestre 2015. Le lieu que nous voulons créer sera beau, il sera contemporain et chaleureux et totalement inédit.

Si le Pagan Café sera, comme son nom l'indique, un lieu de restauration, ce sera en fait, bien plus que ça.

Espace polyvalent, douillet, convivial, mélange entre salon de thé pour vos brunchs, déjeuners et goûters - à base de produits bios et gourmands -  ; bibliothèque avec une sélection d'ouvrages sur l'ésotérisme, l'occultisme, la spiritualité, l'histoire... à bouquiner sur place, au fond d'un canapé moelleux ; boutique, où trouver tous les outils nécessaires à votre pratique - encens, bougies, pierres, plantes... - ; et le soir venu, bar, dans lequel vous pourrez siroter une bière bio ou un vin de fleurs, et vous détendre dans une ambiance chaleureuse.

Le Pagan Café accueillera régulièrement des événements autour du Paganisme, de l'ésotérisme et de la spiritualité : 

- Dîner-débats

- Soirées à thèmes (lors des célébrations païennes par exemple)

- Expositions

- Conférences

...

Bien loin d'être réservé aux païen(ne)s et sympathisants, cet espace un peu hors du temps, sera ouvert à tous et saura, charmer tout le monde :)

Café associatif

La structure existera tout d'abord sous forme d'association, dont les contributeurs à cette campagne, le personnel et bien sûr les fondateurs, feront partie. Si le projet fonctionne, que l'activité devient rentable, la structure se transformera en SCOPARL, un statut coopératif pour une entreprise durable.

Les éventuels bénéfices provenant des activités du Pagan Café seront distribués de la manière suivante :

- 35% pour le développement des activités du Pagan Café

- 65% seront reversés à d'autres associations que nous soutenons et qui rentrent dans les thématiques suivantes : reconnaissance et soutien aux mouvements païens, écologie et environnement, commerce équitable, aide aux personnes en difficulté physique, psychologique ou sociale.

Le but n'est pas l'enrichissement ou entrepreneuriat, mais la création et la pérennité d'un espace d'échange, de partage et de rencontre.

Où ira votre argent ?

Notre projet vous plait, vous avez envie de nous aider, voici où ira votre argent :

L’argent servira au démarrage de l’activité, cela inclut :

-  Dépôt de garantie pour la location des locaux.

-  Equipement du café : machines à café et à chocolat, vaisselles, nappes, verres, plateaux, couverts…

-  Mobilier : fauteuils et canapés confortables et vintage, chaises, tables, bibliothèques, le tout chiner le plus possible dans des brocantes.

-  Élargissement du stock d'articles et produits ésotériques qui seront disponibles à l'achat : encens, bougies, livres, statues, amulettes…

-  Les frais d’installation : travaux de décoration, de mise aux normes éventuels, appareils de cuisine, pose d’un comptoir réfrigéré…

-  Les coûts des démarches administratives, premiers mois d’assurances, passage des examens professionnels pour faire de la petite restauration, dépôt de la marque Pagan Café.

Nous offrons de superbes contreparties en échange de votre engagement ; qui vont d'un bon pour une boisson à des cartes de membres vous donnant droit à un repas gratuit par semaine, des réductions sur la boutique et un Happy Hour permanent.

Si cette idée vous attire, si le Pagan Café est un lieu qui vous souhaitez voir exister,  aidez-nous à le rendre possible en participant financièrement, en échange de votre participation vous recevrez des contreparties exclusives.

D'autres manières de nous aider

N'hésitez pas à partager ce lien avec vos amis et à encouragez les à nous aider et à nous suivre sur Facebook.

Foire aux questions

1) Où se trouvera le Pagan Café ?

- Dans le centre de Paris, de préférence dans le 3ème, 4ème, ou 11ème arrondissement de Paris. 

2) Puis-je postuler pour faire partie de l'aventure du Pagan Café ?

- Bien sûr ! Je recherche activement des personnes susceptibles de participer à l'aventure, que ce soit en tant que vendeur, barman ou en tant qu'intervenant : radiesthésiste, tarologue, etc... Envoyez-moi un mail en vous présentant, ainsi que votre parcours, et ce que vous aimeriez faire au sein du Pagan Café : contact@magiesdumonde.fr 

3) Que servirez-vous dans votre salon ?

Comme vous pouvez le voir dans les contreparties proposées nous servirons des petits déjeuners, des brunchs, des déjeuners, des goûters, des dîners et des tapas.

Tout sera préparé de manière artisanale avec un maximum de produits bio, frais et issus d'une production locale.

Il y aura des salades, des gâteaux, des sandwichs, des jus de fruits, des tisanes, des thés et des boissons alcoolisées légères (bières bios et vins).

4) Puis-je être sur que le Pagan Café va ouvrir ?

Malheureusement, non, nous ne pouvons être surs de rien !

Nous nous sommes donnés 4 mois après la fin du financement pour obtenir le local qui accueillera le Pagan Café ; si toutefois nous n'y parvenions pas, vous pourrez choisir de vous faire rembourser totalement votre participation ou de convertir partie ou totalité de celle-ci en bon d'achat sur la boutique ésotérique en ligne.

Quelle que soit votre décision, je serai contractuellement obligée de l'honorer, et le ferai sans faute.

5) Quand le Pagan Café ouvrira-t-il ses portes si c'est le cas ?

A la fin du financement, il faudra compter environs 6 mois avant l'ouverture du Pagan Café. Nous espérons ouvrir début novembre 2015. 


NB : Image non contractuelle. La photo du Café présentée, est en fait celle du Witche's Brew, café païen américain, dont j'apprécie la déco ^^.
story_txt:
L'idée : un café associatif, dédié au paganisme et à ses adeptes, offrant un lieu de rencontre, de partage et d'échanges autour du paganisme, de l'ésotérisme et de la spiritualité.
Welcome to all english speaking visitors ! To see the english version of this project, please click here, you'll find a pdf document with the translation of the folowing presentation. And do not hesitate to share this page, the more we'll be seen, the more chances we have to reach our goal ;)

Le Paganisme en France
Bien que plusieurs traditions païennes soient reconnues à travers l'Europe, la France reste encore frileuse sur ce point.
Pourtant la communauté païenne française est bien présente. En faisant un rapide tour des réseaux sociaux (faute d'outil de statistique plus élaboré), on peut estimer le nombre de pratiquant(e)s païen(ne)s à environ 10 000 personnes. Les traditions les plus représentées étant le Druidisme, l'Asatrù, l'Hellénisme, et la Wicca.
Cependant, être païen(ne) en France, n'est pas chose facile ; ces traditions étant la plupart du temps, méconnues et dépréciées par le grand public, les pratiquant(e)s de ces diverses traditions sont souvent isolé(e)s.
C'est de ce constat qu'est née l'idée du Pagan Café : offrir un lieu de rencontre, d'échange et de découverte tant pour les païen(ne)s que pour les non-païen(ne)s, dans le respect et l'acceptation de l'autre.

Le Pagan Café, qu'est ce que c'est ?
Le Pagan Café sera un lieu de rencontre pour tous les païen(ne)s de toutes traditions ; un lieu pour partager, échanger, discuter, en toute amitié, autour d'une pinte, d'un muffin ou d'une tisane.
Un espace à la fois convivial et chaleureux, qui offre une véritable opportunité pour rencontrer d'autres païen(ne)s et sympathisant(e)s dans une ambiance confortable et relaxante.
Le projet est d’ouvrir le Pagan Café dans le centre de Paris, au quatrième trimestre 2015. Le lieu que nous voulons créer sera beau, il sera contemporain et chaleureux et totalement inédit.
Si le Pagan Café sera, comme son nom l'indique, un lieu de restauration, ce sera en fait, bien plus que ça.

Le Pagan Café accueillera régulièrement des événements autour du Paganisme, de l'ésotérisme et de la spiritualité : 
- Dîner-débats
- Soirées à thèmes (lors des célébrations païennes par exemple)
- Expositions
- Conférences
...
Bien loin d'être réservé aux païen(ne)s et sympathisants, cet espace un peu hors du temps, sera ouvert à tous et saura, charmer tout le monde :)

La structure existera tout d'abord sous forme d'association, dont les contributeurs à cette campagne, le personnel et bien sûr les fondateurs, feront partie. Si le projet fonctionne, que l'activité devient rentable, la structure se transformera en SCOPARL, un statut coopératif pour une entreprise durable.

Le but n'est pas l'enrichissement ou entrepreneuriat, mais la création et la pérennité d'un espace d'échange, de partage et de rencontre.

-  Dépôt de garantie pour la location des locaux.
-  Equipement du café : machines à café et à chocolat, vaisselles, nappes, verres, plateaux, couverts…
-  Mobilier : fauteuils et canapés confortables et vintage, chaises, tables, bibliothèques, le tout chiner le plus possible dans des brocantes.

-  Les frais d’installation : travaux de décoration, de mise aux normes éventuels, appareils de cuisine, pose d’un comptoir réfrigéré…
-  Les coûts des démarches administratives, premiers mois d’assurances, passage des examens professionnels pour faire de la petite restauration, dépôt de la marque Pagan Café.
Nous offrons de superbes contreparties en échange de votre engagement ; qui vont d'un bon pour une boisson à des cartes de membres vous donnant droit à un repas gratuit par semaine, des réductions sur la boutique et un Happy Hour permanent.

story:
Revolutionizing education: self-directed, peer-to-peer learning for 1 billion under-served children around the world

Maybe it’s chronic poverty, maybe it’s hazardous geography. Perhaps conflicts, humanitarian disasters, or gender-stratified societies interfering. Whatever the cause, there are over 50 million children that cannot go to school and hundreds of millions more that cannot get even a basic primary education.

Even with all the sustained work of Governments, NGO's and individuals working to resolve this global challenge, UNESCO reports this problem will not be fully addressed until 2086. That means an additional three generations of children may be left behind!

That’s where your donation comes in. With a pledge of just $25, you can help one of these under-served children – many of them young girls – be empowered to take their learning into their own hands.

“These children need us to solve this well before 2086, they need us to solve this while they are still children, ... and we can!”

Our Solution

We are designing a solution that will enable children to develop skills, learn about the world, and foster their creativity and passions by teaching each other. Technology will be their tool, not their teacher. Curiosity will fuel their discovery of curriculum. And sharing, not software, will be what drives their success. 

Our highly scalable platform operates both online and offline, on low-cost tablets and can be deployed into challenging remote environments to reach the most chronically under-served children. Together with our open philosophy, which allows us to attract the brightest minds, we know we can solve this while these children are still young! 

What we are doing now: Phase Two

In Phase two — which this campaign is funding — we’re putting all the pieces together for the core technology infrastructure, continuing to field test in the East African country of Tanzania, and crowdsource culturally appropriate content.

The Platform:
We are developing a platform that provides children a curated curriculum for early learning: reading, writing and arithmetic. With an open, flexible architecture that is language and curriculum agnostic, our platform will deliver unique and crowdsourced content from local educators and publishers.

The platform will deliver key and unique features designed to foster the children's creativity and passion and empower self-directed and peer-to-peer learning. It will include the analytics process that will drive each child’s recommendation engine, build the foundations of their open learning map, and the initial explorative game interface that inspires these children to learn. Our full roadmap can be found here.

Field tests and pilots: 
Our goal for 2016 is to work with a few thousand children, many of them through our pilot program in Tanzania. Dev4X’s Head of Pedagogy, Natalie Denmeade is in charge of that pilot, and her progress can be followed through a series we are posting on our blog and social pages: this link. 

 

 

 

Phase two funding and features:

For phase two of our project we are looking to raise over $25000 from interested global citizens like yourself, and following a successful crowdfunding campaign, have that matched by various philanthropists and foundations. These funds allow us to develop and deploy an innovative and impactful educational platform to some of the most underserved children in Tanzania and elsewhere. These are children who want to improve their lives and their futures, and need your help to have that opportunity.

" This crowd-funded approach will send a powerful message that there are people all over the world willing to support a radically different approach to solving this grand challenge! "  - Bodo Hoenen 

The Success of Phase One

In Phase One, we researched best approaches and combined off-the-shelf content with a custom launcher app that tracked the progress of students. With this prototype, we tested how children, given no instructions or guidance, would learn to navigate the device and use the software. All of these children overcame the initial technology literacy hurdle and began learning. This culminated in a successful field test earlier this year in east Africa where we learned a great deal about the best ways to deliver our approach, culturally relevant content and self directed user interface requirements. See more information here.


About Us

We believe we can reach the millions of children who otherwise would not be reached until 2086, within the next 10 years. We can do this through our audacious approach and by embracing the power of community-based open collaboration. 
The Dev4x team is a growing group of over 200 amazing volunteers, advisors and supporters, several PhD’s, neuroscientists, numerous educators, technologists, and designers, with more joining each week. We all believe that the right to have an education should not be limited by poverty, location, or social class and are tierlessly working to make that happen.

See our about us page and an interactive map of our team here.

Our Open Approach in action: 
Having an open approach allows us to attract the brightest minds from around the world. Here are four of our inspirational educators who are supporting this campaign by offering some great perks. You can read more about their work here: Sir Ken Robinson, Seth Godin, Sugata Mitra and Salman Khan.


Presenting our project at TEDx

We had the opportunity to present our project at various events like the Google Solve For X event and TEDx. Here is our TEDx talk:


How you can contribute:

Show your support of the Moonshot Education Project by contributing at one or more of these levels and then by sharing this campaign with like-minded people.

$1: Campaigner 

Donate what you can, as little as $1 dollar. Any contribution will send a powerful message that there are people all over the world willing to support a radically different approach to solving this grand challenge!  

$10: Supporter Package

  • Get credit on our Website, unless you prefer to remain anonymous.

  • Be included in the community mailing list where you can receive exciting updates. 

  • Receive a digital certificate indicating your support for this effort that you can share and use to show your support for this important project.


$25: Early Access Package

  • Receive the previous perks (see above for details).

  • Early beta access to the software (est. June 2016). 




$50: Education Advocacy Package

  • Receive the previous perks (see above for details).

  • Exclusive Dev4X T-Shirt with messages from children to inspire us all to action.


$100: Hole in the Wall Package

  • All of the previous perks at $25 and below, plus:
     
  • A copy of Sugata Mitra’s digital book 'Beyond the Hole in the Wall: Discover the Power of Self-Organized Learning'.

  • A personally signed certificate by Sugata Mitra recognizing your contribution, to accompany a copy of his digital book

$100: Seth Godin Linchpin Package

  • All of the previous perks at $25 and below, plus:

  • Seth Godin’s book 'Linchpin. Are You Indispensable?'.

  • A personally signed certificate by Seth Godin recognizing your contribution, to accompany a copy of his book. 


$100: One World Schoolhouse Package

  • All of the previous perks at $25 and below, plus:

  • Salman Khan’s book 'The One World Schoolhouse: Education Reimagined'.

  • A personally signed certificate by Salman Khan recognizing your contribution, to accompany a copy of his book. 


$100: Creative Schools Package

  • All of the previous perks at $25 and below, plus:

  • Sir Ken Robinson's book: 'Creative Schools: The Grassroots Revolution That’s Transforming Education'.

  • A personally signed certificate by Sir Ken Robinson recognizing your contribution, to accompany a copy of his book 



$250: Virtual Reality Exploration Package

  • All of the previous perks at $25 and below, plus: 

  • A Dev4X virtual reality viewer to enable your phone to be used as a VR headset and view our 360-degree footage 
  • Get first access to our specialized 360-degree footage and witness the children’s joy they experience when empowered to learn. (See Sample)

$1,000: Community Sponsorship Package

  • All of the previous perks at $25 and below, the $250 VR perk, plus:

  • Become a direct sponsor of a group of children. You will receive both recognition via our media and personal progress updates like photos, videos and stories from the children and their community. 

  • Certificate of Community Sponsorship

$2,500: Core Supporter Package

  • All of the previous perks at $25 and below, the $250 and $1K perk, plus:

  • Receive recognition as a core supporter on the Dev4X website and on our media. Provide us your company logo or name and we will share with the world how your contribution has helped bring this project forward.

  • Receive a core supporter certificate.


$10,000: Village Sponsorship Package

  • All of the previous perks at $25 and below, the $250, $1K, $5K perk, plus:

  • Receive personalized videos and messages from the children.
     
  • Become a witness. Tag along to one of our deployment locations and observe child learning first hand (Travel, accommodation and insurance not included).


The Impact

Imagine a world where every child has a personally adapted learning platform that can empower them to take control of their learning. A platform that will foster their creativity, ignite their passion, and instill empathy and compassion as they learn with their friends, their community and the world around them. 

What would happen if the 250 million illiterate children in the world, learned to read, write? What about if the millions of children who will never go to school could still learn anything they needed to? What would result if more than 74% of those that started school, graduated instead of dropping out? What about if 60% of the global illiterate weren’t women who make family decisions on spending, nutrition and health, or if the world’s poorest girls were on track to achieve universal primary completion before 2086? What if we could increase average educational attainment of a country’s population by one year to increase annual GDP per capital growth from 2 to 2.5%? What would result if the world’s youth who live in conflict areas could still learn, foster their creativity, ignite their passion, and instill empathy and compassion then become their nations’ leaders of tomorrow?

Measuring Success:
Defining where we are going and how we will be measuring success is important. One of the ways we are doing so is by developing towards and measuring against specific impacts we want to attain. We have created this impact roadmap infographic to illustrate this. For more detail, you can read further here.

Scaling the impact:
This impact does not mean much if it is not easily reproducible and scalable, which is why from the ground up this has been one of the top design guidelines we have implemented. The solution we are developing is designed to be highly scalable and viral in it's growth capacity. Culturally relevant content can be rapidly produced, remixed and translated, allowing it to be deployed into regions current approaches cannot reach.


The Technology we are building

We have a detailed page dedicated to explaining where we are going in addition to a conceptual prototype, which can be viewed here.  below are the highlights.

The overview:

 

The learning map:
In this phase of the project the core implementation of a highly scalable and flexible learning map is being developed. Unlike other similar initiatives we are developing this to be open and available to all, with the goal of providing curriculum and educational specialists a powerful tool test and validate their approaches.


The learning world interface:
In this phase we will also begin building the game layer interface that will engage children and inspire them to explore. An interesting and exciting learning world game layer is a key component that will keep children engaged, learning and continually wanting to come back for more.  


The learning world future:
To help us down this road we have partnered with Strangeloop games, the amazing team behind the successfully funded ECO game. As part of our work to build a learning world game engine we are working with this team. Parts of the game world will start to take shape in this phase of the project thanks to your generous contributions.

Here are some of the Images from ECO to illustrate the direction we are moving in for the game world through which children will access learning activities and stealth assessments.

 

 

 


Questions and Answers

Are you a non-profit? Can I write-off my contribution with my taxes?
Yes, Dev4X INCORPORATED is a registered 501(c)(3) charity (EIN 47-2367984). You will receive tax receipts for your donations through the crowdfunding campaign.

Why are you crowdfunding?
We believe the quickest way to tackle this grand challenge is with open collaboration. This crowdfunding campaign is a great way by which we can rally the support of many people from around the world. It is also a way of showcasing our efforts to larger organizations intending to fund this project that there is strong global backing for a radically new and open approach to tackling this challenge. 

What if you raise more money than what is requested here?
This campaign is to raise funds for phase two, additional funds will assist us to move into further phases of the project, and accelerate the impact we can achieve.

How will the money be used, and how can I track the progress?
As an open project, we are transparent with our efforts. You can follow our continued progress via our website blog, on social media and see the real world impact your donation is making. The funds raised in this campaign will go to developing phase two of the platform and working in East Africa. Over the next year, our aim is to deploy to a few thousand children, many of whom will be reached through our pilot in Tanzania being run by our head of pedagogy, Natalie Denmeade. Her progress can be followed through a series we are posting on our blog and social pages which can be followed through this link. 

Why not raise funds from NGO's and Governments?
We are raising funds from multiple sources, including NGO's and Governments, however, we are purposefully being very cautious because many of these sources are filled with bureaucracy, inefficiency, politics and in many cases corruption. We are staying true to our mission and concentrating on what's most important, the children. This is also why crowdfunding is such a powerful option. In the short term this strategy makes things more difficult but in the long term it's what's going to allow us to succeed where so many others get stuck in politics, protectionism, short term thinking and pandering to the status quo.

How are you different to other initiatives?
Some of the key innovations that are setting us apart are: 

  • Our radically open approach. Developing an open platform with a sustainable long term strategy in place allows us to both rapidly engage the world's expertise but also sustain it with a self-funding business model. 
  • We are building our platform to work both online and offline. Therefore, participation in online collaboration would be offered in both synchronous and asynchronous modes. 
  • Our underlying platform foundation is built on highly scalable architecture and utilizes a dynamic open learning map that allows it to be rapidly extended to any curriculum, language or outcome, and adapted to each child. While there are a few such learning maps, most are based on closed-ended, siloed business models that do not allow them to be interoperable or they are focused on specific domains. We are creating an open version that many can contribute to and anyone can use. It will provide unmatched opportunity to derive meaningful metrics on each step of the children's learning experience across multiple curriculums and learning paths to find what works best for each individual child. Over time, we see it as the goto curriculum resource for any educator to validate what works. This would be the first time such a powerful resource would be available openly. 
  • Dev4x innovations include mesh networking, offline mobile AI and Machine learning, Offline mobile learning management and a data structure that is focused on privacy.

How will you keep children engaged?
The Dev4x open learning map underlies a quest based learning journey that is designed to keep children engaged, and motivated through gamification. Through the use of mesh networking technology, the platform utilizes social tools to facilitate collaborative learning opportunities even when offline, encouraging the children to teach each other.(You can read more about that on our technology page: under mentorship and social learning)

How is Dev4X currently funded?
Our Core team and the over 200 volunteers are currently all non-remunerated. We are currently self-financed and funded to a small degree through individual donations and some grants from foundations like the Shuttleworth Foundation. We are actively raising capital from foundations, high net worth philanthropists, and individuals with the intention to secure funds for the core team and our efforts.

What is the technology vision?
In this phase we will be building the underlying infrastructure to support our long-term vision of the project that includes features like Voice recognition, machine learning and AI support to help guide and empower the children.

More detail and our conceptual prototype can be found here. 


Other Ways You Can Help

We are a radically open project and we want to encourage any and everyone with the talent and passion to help to join us on this mission. To register to join visit this page and fill in your details.
story_txt:
Revolutionizing education: self-directed, peer-to-peer learning for 1 billion under-served children around the worldMaybe it’s chronic poverty, maybe it’s hazardous geography. Perhaps conflicts, humanitarian disasters, or gender-stratified societies interfering. Whatever the cause, there are over 50 million children that cannot go to school and hundreds of millions more that cannot get even a basic primary education. Even with all the sustained work of Governments, NGO's and individuals working to resolve this global challenge, UNESCO reports this problem will not be fully addressed until 2086. That means an additional three generations of children may be left behind!
That’s where your donation comes in. With a pledge of just $25, you can help one of these under-served children – many of them young girls – be empowered to take their learning into their own hands.





“These children need us to solve this well before 2086, they need us to solve this while they are still children, ... and we can!”

Our Solution
We are designing a solution that will enable children to develop skills, learn about the world, and foster their creativity and passions by teaching each other. Technology will be their tool, not their teacher. Curiosity will fuel their discovery of curriculum. And sharing, not software, will be what drives their success. Our highly scalable platform operates both online and offline, on low-cost tablets and can be deployed into challenging remote environments to reach the most chronically under-served children. Together with our open philosophy, which allows us to attract the brightest minds, we know we can solve this while these children are still young! What we are doing now: Phase Two
In Phase two — which this campaign is funding — we’re putting all the pieces together for the core technology infrastructure, continuing to field test in the East African country of Tanzania, and crowdsource culturally appropriate content.
The Platform:We are developing a platform that provides children a curated curriculum for early learning: reading, writing and arithmetic. With an open, flexible architecture that is language and curriculum agnostic, our platform will deliver unique and crowdsourced content from local educators and publishers.The platform will deliver key and unique features designed to foster the children's creativity and passion and empower self-directed and peer-to-peer learning. It will include the analytics process that will drive each child’s recommendation engine, build the foundations of their open learning map, and the initial explorative game interface that inspires these children to learn. Our full roadmap can be found here.
Field tests and pilots: Our goal for 2016 is to work with a few thousand children, many of them through our pilot program in Tanzania. Dev4X’s Head of Pedagogy, Natalie Denmeade is in charge of that pilot, and her progress can be followed through a series we are posting on our blog and social pages: this link. 


 
 
 
Phase two funding and features:For phase two of our project we are looking to raise over $25000 from interested global citizens like yourself, and following a successful crowdfunding campaign, have that matched by various philanthropists and foundations. These funds allow us to develop and deploy an innovative and impactful educational platform to some of the most underserved children in Tanzania and elsewhere. These are children who want to improve their lives and their futures, and need your help to have that opportunity.







" This crowd-funded approach will send a powerful message that there are people all over the world willing to support a radically different approach to solving this grand challenge! "  - Bodo Hoenen 


The Success of Phase One

In Phase One, we researched best approaches and combined off-the-shelf content with a custom launcher app that tracked the progress of students. With this prototype, we tested how children, given no instructions or guidance, would learn to navigate the device and use the software. All of these children overcame the initial technology literacy hurdle and began learning. This culminated in a successful field test earlier this year in east Africa where we learned a great deal about the best ways to deliver our approach, culturally relevant content and self directed user interface requirements. See more information here.


About Us
We believe we can reach the millions of children who otherwise would not be reached until 2086, within the next 10 years. We can do this through our audacious approach and by embracing the power of community-based open collaboration. 
The Dev4x team is a growing group of over 200 amazing volunteers, advisors and supporters, several PhD’s, neuroscientists, numerous educators, technologists, and designers, with more joining each week. We all believe that the right to have an education should not be limited by poverty, location, or social class and are tierlessly working to make that happen.
See our about us page and an interactive map of our team here.

Our Open Approach in action: Having an open approach allows us to attract the brightest minds from around the world. Here are four of our inspirational educators who are supporting this campaign by offering some great perks. You can read more about their work here: Sir Ken Robinson, Seth Godin, Sugata Mitra and Salman Khan.





Presenting our project at TEDx

We had the opportunity to present our project at various events like the Google Solve For X event and TEDx. Here is our TEDx talk:


How you can contribute:
Show your support of the Moonshot Education Project by contributing at one or more of these levels and then by sharing this campaign with like-minded people.


$1: Campaigner 

Donate what you can, as little as $1 dollar. Any contribution will send a powerful message that there are people all over the world willing to support a radically different approach to solving this grand challenge!  $10: Supporter Package




Get credit on our Website, unless you prefer to remain anonymous.


Be included in the community mailing list where you can receive exciting updates. 


Receive a digital certificate indicating your support for this effort that you can share and use to show your support for this important project.











$25: Early Access Package



Receive the previous perks (see above for details).
Early beta access to the software (est. June 2016). 












$50: Education Advocacy Package



Receive the previous perks (see above for details).

Exclusive Dev4X T-Shirt with messages from children to inspire us all to action.




$100: Hole in the Wall Package




All of the previous perks at $25 and below, plus: 
A copy of Sugata Mitra’s digital book 'Beyond the Hole in the Wall: Discover the Power of Self-Organized Learning'.
A personally signed certificate by Sugata Mitra recognizing your contribution, to accompany a copy of his digital book

$100: Seth Godin Linchpin Package






All of the previous perks at $25 and below, plus:
Seth Godin’s book 'Linchpin. Are You Indispensable?'.

A personally signed certificate by Seth Godin recognizing your contribution, to accompany a copy of his book. 







$100: One World Schoolhouse Package




All of the previous perks at $25 and below, plus:
Salman Khan’s book 'The One World Schoolhouse: Education Reimagined'.

A personally signed certificate by Salman Khan recognizing your contribution, to accompany a copy of his book. 





$100: Creative Schools Package




All of the previous perks at $25 and below, plus:
Sir Ken Robinson's book: 'Creative Schools: The Grassroots Revolution That’s Transforming Education'.

A personally signed certificate by Sir Ken Robinson recognizing your contribution, to accompany a copy of his book 





$250: Virtual Reality Exploration Package



All of the previous perks at $25 and below, plus: 

A Dev4X virtual reality viewer to enable your phone to be used as a VR headset and view our 360-degree footage 


Get first access to our specialized 360-degree footage and witness the children’s joy they experience when empowered to learn. (See Sample)




$1,000: Community Sponsorship Package





All of the previous perks at $25 and below, the $250 VR perk, plus:
Become a direct sponsor of a group of children. You will receive both recognition via our media and personal progress updates like photos, videos and stories from the children and their community. 

Certificate of Community Sponsorship





$2,500: Core Supporter Package







All of the previous perks at $25 and below, the $250 and $1K perk, plus:
Receive recognition as a core supporter on the Dev4X website and on our media. Provide us your company logo or name and we will share with the world how your contribution has helped bring this project forward.

Receive a core supporter certificate.








$10,000: Village Sponsorship Package





All of the previous perks at $25 and below, the $250, $1K, $5K perk, plus:
Receive personalized videos and messages from the children. 
Become a witness. Tag along to one of our deployment locations and observe child learning first hand (Travel, accommodation and insurance not included).




The Impact

Imagine a world where every child has a personally adapted learning platform that can empower them to take control of their learning. A platform that will foster their creativity, ignite their passion, and instill empathy and compassion as they learn with their friends, their community and the world around them. 
What would happen if the 250 million illiterate children in the world, learned to read, write? What about if the millions of children who will never go to school could still learn anything they needed to? What would result if more than 74% of those that started school, graduated instead of dropping out? What about if 60% of the global illiterate weren’t women who make family decisions on spending, nutrition and health, or if the world’s poorest girls were on track to achieve universal primary completion before 2086? What if we could increase average educational attainment of a country’s population by one year to increase annual GDP per capital growth from 2 to 2.5%? What would result if the world’s youth who live in conflict areas could still learn, foster their creativity, ignite their passion, and instill empathy and compassion then become their nations’ leaders of tomorrow?


Measuring Success:Defining where we are going and how we will be measuring success is important. One of the ways we are doing so is by developing towards and measuring against specific impacts we want to attain. We have created this impact roadmap infographic to illustrate this. For more detail, you can read further here.



Scaling the impact:This impact does not mean much if it is not easily reproducible and scalable, which is why from the ground up this has been one of the top design guidelines we have implemented. The solution we are developing is designed to be highly scalable and viral in it's growth capacity. Culturally relevant content can be rapidly produced, remixed and translated, allowing it to be deployed into regions current approaches cannot reach.




The Technology we are buildingWe have a detailed page dedicated to explaining where we are going in addition to a conceptual prototype, which can be viewed here.  below are the highlights.

The overview:

 
The learning map:In this phase of the project the core implementation of a highly scalable and flexible learning map is being developed. Unlike other similar initiatives we are developing this to be open and available to all, with the goal of providing curriculum and educational specialists a powerful tool test and validate their approaches.


The learning world interface: In this phase we will also begin building the game layer interface that will engage children and inspire them to explore. An interesting and exciting learning world game layer is a key component that will keep children engaged, learning and continually wanting to come back for more.  


The learning world future: To help us down this road we have partnered with Strangeloop games, the amazing team behind the successfully funded ECO game. As part of our work to build a learning world game engine we are working with this team. Parts of the game world will start to take shape in this phase of the project thanks to your generous contributions.

Here are some of the Images from ECO to illustrate the direction we are moving in for the game world through which children will access learning activities and stealth assessments.


 
 
 





Questions and Answers

Are you a non-profit? Can I write-off my contribution with my taxes? Yes, Dev4X INCORPORATED is a registered 501(c)(3) charity (EIN 47-2367984). You will receive tax receipts for your donations through the crowdfunding campaign.
Why are you crowdfunding?We believe the quickest way to tackle this grand challenge is with open collaboration. This crowdfunding campaign is a great way by which we can rally the support of many people from around the world. It is also a way of showcasing our efforts to larger organizations intending to fund this project that there is strong global backing for a radically new and open approach to tackling this challenge. 
What if you raise more money than what is requested here?This campaign is to raise funds for phase two, additional funds will assist us to move into further phases of the project, and accelerate the impact we can achieve.

How will the money be used, and how can I track the progress?As an open project, we are transparent with our efforts. You can follow our continued progress via our website blog, on social media and see the real world impact your donation is making. The funds raised in this campaign will go to developing phase two of the platform and working in East Africa. Over the next year, our aim is to deploy to a few thousand children, many of whom will be reached through our pilot in Tanzania being run by our head of pedagogy, Natalie Denmeade. Her progress can be followed through a series we are posting on our blog and social pages which can be followed through this link. 

Why not raise funds from NGO's and Governments?We are raising funds from multiple sources, including NGO's and Governments, however, we are purposefully being very cautious because many of these sources are filled with bureaucracy, inefficiency, politics and in many cases corruption. We are staying true to our mission and concentrating on what's most important, the children. This is also why crowdfunding is such a powerful option. In the short term this strategy makes things more difficult but in the long term it's what's going to allow us to succeed where so many others get stuck in politics, protectionism, short term thinking and pandering to the status quo.
How are you different to other initiatives? Some of the key innovations that are setting us apart are: 


Our radically open approach. Developing an open platform with a sustainable long term strategy in place allows us to both rapidly engage the world's expertise but also sustain it with a self-funding business model. 
We are building our platform to work both online and offline. Therefore, participation in online collaboration would be offered in both synchronous and asynchronous modes. 
Our underlying platform foundation is built on highly scalable architecture and utilizes a dynamic open learning map that allows it to be rapidly extended to any curriculum, language or outcome, and adapted to each child. While there are a few such learning maps, most are based on closed-ended, siloed business models that do not allow them to be interoperable or they are focused on specific domains. We are creating an open version that many can contribute to and anyone can use. It will provide unmatched opportunity to derive meaningful metrics on each step of the children's learning experience across multiple curriculums and learning paths to find what works best for each individual child. Over time, we see it as the goto curriculum resource for any educator to validate what works. This would be the first time such a powerful resource would be available openly. 

Dev4x innovations include mesh networking, offline mobile AI and Machine learning, Offline mobile learning management and a data structure that is focused on privacy.


How will you keep children engaged?The Dev4x open learning map underlies a quest based learning journey that is designed to keep children engaged, and motivated through gamification. Through the use of mesh networking technology, the platform utilizes social tools to facilitate collaborative learning opportunities even when offline, encouraging the children to teach each other.(You can read more about that on our technology page: under mentorship and social learning)
How is Dev4X currently funded?Our Core team and the over 200 volunteers are currently all non-remunerated. We are currently self-financed and funded to a small degree through individual donations and some grants from foundations like the Shuttleworth Foundation. We are actively raising capital from foundations, high net worth philanthropists, and individuals with the intention to secure funds for the core team and our efforts.

What is the technology vision?In this phase we will be building the underlying infrastructure to support our long-term vision of the project that includes features like Voice recognition, machine learning and AI support to help guide and empower the children.
More detail and our conceptual prototype can be found here. 




Other Ways You Can HelpWe are a radically open project and we want to encourage any and everyone with the talent and passion to help to join us on this mission. To register to join visit this page and fill in your details.

story:
Who we are and what we aim for

We are a Nonprofit located in Tijuana México. We work with small Organizations and Ministries like Orphanages & Children at Risk Institutions helping Children and Youth to get what they lack of: Family, identity and the opportunity to dream again.

We believe that one of the best things we can give to our children is an opportunity to grow and change their lives. In partnership with a local Educational Non Profit Institution and 5 local Children’s Homes, our goal is to provide boys, girls, teens and youth under our care Quality Education with Christian Values in a place where they can feel welcome and supported instead of rejected and judged which has been more the experience with many institutions in the past.

  • We want to ensure a safe environment at School covering their basic needs and having education with dignity form Pre-school to College.
  • We want to accompany their personal development process partnering with local Organizations that can provide tailored mentoring, education and training in order to help our children in the definition of their identity and developing their leadership, reinforcing their values and strengths at the same time.
  • We are partnering with other Children's homes to provide the same care and education to more children because we understand the importance of this specific area in the lives of children.
  • Raise "healthy" boys, girls, teenagers and youth with skills and abilities that will contribute to society as change agents instead of becoming a social issue.
  • We want to increase the coverage of the project to 4000 children by the year 2019
  • Take the project to the main cities of Mexico and replicate it in South America by the year 2020

Our 2015-2016 Goal

  • This fundraiser aims to provide school for 450 Orphans & Children at Risk providing them the best experience of education with dignity, enabling us to become a place where other foster institutions can send their children to school.
  • We require to raise funds for a total of 584,440 USD for the 2015-2016 year activities distributed like this:
  • 280,000 USD to buy independent school facilities.
  • 304,440 USD to fulfill the 2015-2016 operation costs for 450 children including uniforms and school supplies.

In the case our goal is not reached, we´ll rent facilities and reduce the amount of groups along with some Administration/Operation costs.


The Impact

There are around 2,000,000 (yes, 2 million) orphans and 150,000 children in streets in Mexico, of which 2,000 orphans and at least 3,000 children in streets live in Tijuana. They have limited access or do not receive any kind of education or mentoring. Launching this project will mean that the 10% of this population will have a new chance for life in this stage of a 20 year plan.

  • Providing them with an opportunity to change their lives has a direct impact in  our society because they will become givers instead of takers.
  • Having a School where they can receive tailored education can allow us to open our doors to more children from other foster institutions and become an instrument to promote change in our city
  • We can provide a real solution for a social problem.

Getting involved

You can get involved donating, volunteering, praying or also spreading the word. If you want to contribute in a larger scale, in kind or get involved volunteering please add a note with your contribution and we will contact you ASAP.

Thank you for joining us in providing love, care and education to our children, planting a seed that will bear fruit and will bring hope to our Children.
