story:
Bienvenido a Illumium Tutoriales

Hola, mi nombre es Arturo y soy Lic. en Producción de Audio Digital tengo 30 años y soy un chico normal pero con sueños y metas muy grandes, de los cuales uno de los más importantes es crear un lugar donde puedas obtener conocimiento multimedia sin costo alguno, donde puedas entrar y aprender de forma fácil, rápida y sencilla como solo dar play al botón de YouTube. Por esa razón, he creado el canal de "Illumium Tutoriales", el cual puedes visitar con toda la confianza dando clic aquí: Illumium Tutoriales - YouTube Channel

El canal va creciendo poco a poco, justo el 24 de Diciembre éramos 1000 suscriptores, a los cuales llamo "mis iluminados", actualmente somos  4,000 y seguimos creciendo, todo con el firme objetivo de que el conocimiento sea libre.

El canal nace de la necesidad de contenido de fácil acceso y digerible para todos, ya que hay muchos hermanos de habla hispana que no tienen la posibilidad de comprar cursos o pagar universidades, las cuales enseñan estos programas con costos muy elevados o cuando son baratas te los dan de forma mediocre y claro diciendo "Sigue el nivel Medio" y luego el "Nivel Avanzado" y luego el "Master" y .... bueno, ya sabes, cuando menos lo esperas ya has invertido miles de dólares de granito en granito.
Cansado de este tipo de educación que solo les importa el dinero y no los alumnos fue la razón de la creación de este medio, aquí no importa tu religión, el sexo, edad, la raza o el estatus socio económico, todos son bienvenidos, pero como todo hogar necesita mantenimiento y esa es la razón de la campaña.
Por cuestiones de la fuerza mayor (cosa del clima) mi computadora fue dañada y ahora no puedo continuar con esta labor que para mi es un placer, me han proporcionado una laptop para poder continuar de forma básica, contestando mensajes en la página de Facebook (http://on.fb.me/1psZwTQ) , en YouTube o del grupo (http://on.fb.me/1XAv4SV) Por lo cual me encuentro recaudando fondos para una nueva PC.

La magnitud de esto llegará hasta donde mi vida alcance, ya que tengo muchos proyectos a futuro con todos ustedes, como el de fundar una escuela presencial de estudios multimedia para jóvenes, niños y adultos de bajos recursos, uno nunca sabe de donde vendrá el próximo DaVinci, además de crearemos videojuegos gratuitos, un estudio de fotogrametría,  desarrollo de tecnología 3D, organización de convenciones y ¿porqué no? nuestro propio motor de videojuegos,  una consola o entrar al mundo de la impresión 3D biológica.

Suena muy "guajiro" dirían mis paisanos Mexicanos, lo sé, pero cada día doy un paso más con la ayuda de mis queridos iluminados que me inspiran a seguir adelante a pesar de las adversidades, ya comenzamos por el lado educativo, sigamos más adelante. 

Para continuar con este proyecto se necesitan cuatro mil billetes de los verdes o dólares, sé que pensarás "¿WTF! quieres una computadora de la NASA?" ... básicamente no, pero necesito una PC que pueda permitirme realizar muchas tareas al mismo tiempo como hacer Renderizado mientras grabo los tutoriales, como los que realicé para el MEGACURSO de VRay:


Cuando tenga que hacer varios videos, poder grabar mientras renderizo otro video, que los que saben conocen sobre el tema me darán la razón sobre el tiempo que se tarda en procesar un video y los que no, lo veremos en un curso de PremierPro y AfterEffects, también el  renderizar en VRay mientras renderizo video y grabo lo que está ocurriendo en la pantalla ... eso si está de muerte.

Unreal Engine 4, 3DS Max, Zbrush, Photoshop, Audition, SketchUp, Blender, Marvelous Designer, After Effects, Premier Pro, Substance Suite, Quixel Suite, CorelDRAW, Make Human, World Machine, VRay, Keyshot, Marmoset Toolbag, Propellerhead Reason, FL Studio, SpeedTree, Sculptris, TopoGun y Simplygon.
Claro, si va saliendo más software con todo gusto los invitaré a ir aprendiendo juntos.
En cuestión de programación C++ y BluePrints, tendré el apoyo de un gran amigo, Juan Rodrigo Ayala, que es parte de esta grandiosa familia iluminada, él los guiará cuando llegue el momento de darle vida y acción a nuestros videojuegos y recorridos arquitectónicos.
Todo el aprendizaje será en base a un proyecto AAA de un videojuego MMORPG con tecnología de Unreal Engine 4 y FreeToPlay llamado "KARION: Breaking God's", este tipo de juegos son muy complejos en cuestión de arquitectura y paisajismo (así que servirá para ArchViz en el subcanal Illumium Arquitectura) y además en programación de IA, animación, partículas, UI/UX, interacción PlayerToPlayer y más elementos que contienen programación (Illumium Videojuegos) en pocas palabras, aprenderás a hacer juegos calidad "AAA" desde 0, sin dejar a un lado la música, los SFX y tus propios ¡trailers!
En cuestiones de arquitectura, tendré el apoyo de otro gran amigo y colaborador del canal, el Arq. Pablo Villavicencio, el cual estará creando los conceptos y la infraestructura que tendrá el videojuego.
Además de la PC, también se va a adquirir un micrófono para mejorar la calidad del audio de los tutoriales y una web cam para hacerlos más dinámicos, claro, no puede faltar la adquisición de un servicio de hosting y dominio para hacer más formal el canal ya con su propia página web donde sería genial poder aplicar un sistema de aulas virtuales para poder dar clases en vivo.


El obstáculo más grande que puedo encontrar a lo largo del camino, es que no se llegue a la meta y te preguntarás ¿Qué pasará con el dinero recaudado Arturo? 

Si llegara a pasar, tendría que continuar el canal pero con un flujo de trabajo más lento por que se grabaría remotamente y claro, como la PC no es mía, tendría un horario de trabajo reducido para no afectar los tiempos de Juan Rodrigo que ya hizo mucho proporcionándome su computador.

Compraría el micrófono, la web cam y si es posible el sitio web.

Yo confío plenamente en todos, como pueden ver, no es una causa personal, es de todos, que beneficiará no solo a los actuales iluminados si no a los que vienen, ya que mi meta es crear el canal de tutoriales de habla hispana más grande e importante del mundo en cuestiones 3D.

Tengo consiente que no todo es gratis en esta vida, les muestro cuales serán las recompensas a seguir en esta campaña.


De antemano comprendo que muchos de mis iluminados, familiares, amigos y conocidos no pueden aportar por cualquier situación personal, pero aún así pueden colaborar con la causa. 

Hagan ECO con esta campaña, difúndanla en sus redes sociales, en su facebook, en grupos, en su twitter, en instagram, en cualquier lugar que pueda colocarse una publicación, eso es muchísima ayuda, lo cual le dará credibilidad y crecimiendo a éste, el proyecto de todos.

Pueden utilizar las herramientas de IndieGogo para poder compartir esta campaña.

Para poder enviarme un mensaje pueden hacerlo directamente en mis redes sociales que dejo a continuación:
YouTube Channel
Facebook Page
E-Mail: illumium.3d@gmail.com

Gracias por regalarme unos minutos de tu tiempo leyendo este texto que ha sido de mucha importancia para poder continuar con el canal y mejorarlo constantemente.

Solo queda desearte un excelente día, una excelente noche y ¡hasta siempre!

¿Cuándo termina la campaña?

R= 26 de Mayo del 2016

¿Puedo donar múltiples veces y que se acumule?

R= Claro que si, solo procura siempre poner tu nombre.

¿Los tutoriales serán libres?

R= Así es, llegando a la meta los tutoriales seguirán siendo libres, no colocaré nada de pago, las recompensas son una forma de agradecer que apoyaron la causa.

¿Es cierta esta campaña?

R= Claro que si mi estimado iluminado, IndieGogo no se presta para juegos, además, si ocurre un problema, la página libera todos mis datos para que puedas realizar tu denuncia en caso de incumplimiento o estafa.

story:
See our intro video:






How can you help ScientistJournal and SJ.Community on its long journey to make the world a better place? 

We realize that some of you can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

·  Please register at ScientistJournal.com. The resulted login user & password will work on all our platforms. On 01 September 2016 join our SJ Community.

·  Ask your friends to join too.

·  Like our Facebook page at: www.facebook.com/scientistjournal  and www.facebook.com/youtabscience and share it with your friends.

·  You can get the word out and make some noise about the campaign by using  Indiegogo's share tools.

·  Give us feedback and share your ideas with us: what should we focus first? What options you want to see added in the future?

                                                         Thank you for your time, support and contribution,

                                                                                                        Adrian Ovidiu Tanase M.D.  

                                                                                                          Adrian Horcea-Milcu M.D.

its long journey to make the world a better place? 
We realize that some of you can't
contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Please register at
ScientistJournal.com. The resulted login user & password will work on all
our platforms. On 01 September 2016 join our SJ Community. 
· 
Ask your friends to join too.
· 
Like our Facebook page at: www.facebook.com/scientistjournal  and www.facebook.com/youtabscience
and share it with your friends.

story:
Ecuador Field Course Fund

Hello, my name is Cairo and I am a student at the University of Lincoln in the UK studying biology. As a member of the School of Life Sciences within the university I have been given an amazing opportunity to undertake an overseas field course as one of my final year modules. I have chosen to participate in the trip to Ecuador in the summer, the trip will allow me and others to learn about the history, conservation and biology of the site based at the Santa Lucia Cloud Forest Reserve near Nanegal. 

This will also be the first time I have ever travelled outside of my home country, making the prospect of going even more exciting.

My individual research project Ihope to base on Arachnid Diversity in relation to altitudinal gradients. This will involve finding wild and wonderful different species of arachnid, and recording via random sampling at different altitudes which species, how many of each species, and how many different species are found at each site.

Entomology, the study of insects and Arachnology the study of spiders other spider like creatures have always been areas of Biology that I have found particularly fascinating.

"Showing my passion for butterflies"

What We Need & What You Get

The money I am raising will go towards the flight costs to Quito and return flight costs, these total to around £1000 and equipment I will need such as appropriate clothing/gear.I am asking for £600 and will be gaining the rest of my funds from my student loan (Which I'm sure you're aware isn't much) and working over the summer, by helping out you will not only be helping me achieve a personal dream of visiting the rainforest but, also giving me a once in a lifetime opportunity which I hope will provide me with skills that will help me throughout my life.

Even if all the funds I can use the money for the equipment I need and then raise the money for the flights elsewhere.

For those who donate and have a n interest in the field, it would be a pleasure to send my findings and work to you so you can see first hand what the funding helped me create.

A great way of finding more about the course is by following this link: http://ofcsls.blogs.lincoln.ac.uk/

Venmous and deadly animals will be everywhere however so I will have to channel my inner David Attenborough in order to not end up running around screaming when I find a spider on my shoulder.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you are unable to help with the funding process directly, don't worry you can still help, by telling friends or family who may have a passion for Biology, or even just science projects then sharing this with them will help spread the word and increase the chances of the funds being raised and making the campaign a success.

    Thank you for taking the time to read my proposal, apologies if it was boring but I hope I have convinced you to help make a donation no matter or big or small everything is appreciated.

story:
English info below!

------------------------------------------------------

Una convención mixta, Brony y Furry, en España.

Probablemente los términos "Brony" o "Furry" te serán familiares.

Furries:

Los furries son todos aquellos amantes de los animales peludos, ya sean antropomórficos o comunes. En esta categoría entra una gran variedad de especies, incluyendo perros, gatos, conejos, serpientes, dragones e incluso fénix.

Tendremos espacios dedicados a los furries, como stands con arte y merchandising artesano, zona para jugar y abrazarse unos a otros y una gran sala de fiesta con música, concursos y mucha diversión.

Bronies:

Los Bronies son los amantes del universo My Little Pony y todos sus habitantes, sean ponies, grifos, changelings o parasprites.

En las zonas dedicadas a MLP encontrareis juegos, actividades temáticas y contaremos con algunas actrices de doblaje de la serie. ¡Perfecto para encontrar la magia de la amistad!

Pues bien, Paws & Hooves es el primer evento mixto de España. ¡Para todos los que quieran asistir, tanto de nuestro país como  extrangeros!

¿Dónde y cuándo?

Será en el centro de juventud "El sitio de mi recreo" en Villa de Vallecas, los días 18 y 19 de marzo del 2016, de las 10 horas a las 21 horas.

¿Quién organiza esta convención?

La organización nació de un acuerdo entre Furkig y un equipo brony. Ambas partes ayudaron a gestar un evento mixto, ya que el fandom brony y el fandom furry van unidos de la mano dada la naturaleza de ambos.

El equipo de Furkig ha participado en multitud de eventos, siendo especialista en la organización de los mismos. También son conocidos en el ámbito fursuiter tanto nacional como internacionalmente.

¿Pero por qué queréis dinero?

Los fondos que se recauden a través de esta plataforma serán destinados a traer invitados, equipaciones, más entretenimiento para vosotros en general y sobre todo a tener la posibilidad de crecer mucho más. Si aportáis por poco que sea a este evento no os quedaréis con las manos vacías, porque cada aportación tiene una magnífica recompensa, que podréis obtener si nos ayudáis a llegar al objetivo.

¿Has dicho "invitados"?

Sí, se traerán invitados tanto del fandom furry como del brony. Entre estos invitados se encuentran gente del mundo del cosplay, del doblaje y muchos artistas.

Algunos invitados que podemos revelaros son:

Illisia, popular cosplayer con un gran palmarés de eventos en España. Trabaja para MSI Iberia y hace ella misma la gran cantidad de cosplay que posee.

Chachimina Cosplay, cosplayer nacional también muy conocida por muchos eventos. Tiene una gran cantidad de fans por la calidad de sus diseños.

Pau Lugia, animadora, dibujante y creadora del cartel del evento, que firmará ejemplares del mismo a tamaño postal de forma totalmente gratuita para darse a conocer.

Y si confío en vosotros y contribuyo en esta campaña, ¿qué consigo?

¡Echa un vistazo a tu derecha! Hay un montón de cositas que puedes conseguir con tus donativos.

 - Diseño de la chapa del evento


Diseño de la taza a manos de TailaFox


z


Diseño de la camiseta, por Moonlight


Diseño del busto de la mascota del evento de Moonlight


Diseño de la mascara de fursuit scootaloo de Furkig


En caso de que no podáis asistir a la convención, no os preocupéis, porque la organización se encargará de que lo podáis recibir en vuestra casa.

Y además podemos aseguraros que los productos de esta campaña son exclusivos, no podrás obtenerlos en ningún otro lugar.

¿Y si no reunís el dinero?

Si no alcanzamos el objetivo el evento tendrá lugar igualmente, ya que estamos trabajando muy duro para sacarlo adelante. Pero pensad que cualquier cantidad que aportéis para ayudarnos sirve para traeros más entretenimiento y recuerdos muy gratos del evento.

Mira, es que mi economía no me permite apoyaros, pero me gustaría participar...

Por poca que sea tu economía tenemos recompensas para las que hace falta aportar muy poco, y tu nombre aparecería igual en los créditos del evento y en nuestra página web.

Si aún así no puedes permitirte ayudarnos económicamente, ¡muchísimas gracias igualmente! De verdad, agradecemos tu apoyo, sigues pudiendo hacer cosas. Si quieres echarnos un cable, por favor, comparte esta campaña en tus redes sociales y hazla llegar a otros bronies y furries.

En nuestra barra de progreso del IndieGOGO podeis ver en que invertiremos el dinero de cada meta. 

También, si vives en la zona de Madrid, o vas a estar en la ciudad en Marzo, toda ayuda es bien recibida. Si crees que puedes echarnos una mano como voluntario, contacta con nosotros en nuestra página web (pawshoofs.blogspot.com).

-------------------------------------------

A both furry and brony convention in Spain,


Probably furry and brony terms sounds you familiar.

Furries:

Furries are all those furry animals lovers, like anthro or common. This category ranges from a wide variety of species, including dogs, cats, rabbits, snakes, dragons or even phoenix.

We'll have dedicated areas furries, with stands holding artwork and artisan merchandising, play zone and hugs one too, a big party room with music, contests and lots of fun.

Bronies:

Bronies are My Little Pony universe lovers and all its inhabitants, like ponies, griffins, changelings or parasprites.

In the MLP dedicated areas you will find themed games, activities and we'll count with some spanish voice actors. Perfect for finding the magic of friendship!

Paws & Hooves is the first convention in Spain mixing both fandoms, for all those who are interested in assisting.


When and where?

It will be held the youth center "El Sitio de mi Recreo" in Villa de Vallecas, on March 18th and 19th, 2016, from 10am till 21pm.

Who's organizing this convention?

The organization was born from a agreement between FurKig and a brony team. Both parts helped managing a mixed convention, because furry and brony fandoms are bound together due to their nature.

The FurKig team has taken place in many conventions. They are also known by the fursuiter community, nationally and internationally.


But why do you need money?

Finance collected in this crowdfunding will be aimed for guests acomodation, equipment and more entretainment for you. And to have the possibility of growing much more.

Even if you can't contribute with much, you won't leave empty handed, because every contribution has a magnificent reward, which you'll get if you help us to reach the goal.


Did you say "guests"?

Yes, we will be bringing guests for both the furry and brony fandoms. Among these guests there will cosplayers, original voice actors and lots of artists.


Some confirmed guests are:

Illisia, popular cosplayer with a great history in spanish events. She works for MSI Iberia and she crafts by herself her beautiful costumes.

Chachimina Cosplay, a well known national cosplayer in many events. She has a great amount of fans because of her desings quality.

Pau Lugia, animator, painter and the designer for the cons poster, who, by the way, will be signing postcard size copies of the poster for people who want to know her.


And if I trust in you and I contribute in this campaign, what do I get?

Look to your right! There are so many things you can get deppending on your contribution.


 - Convention's logo badge


Aleena Cup, design by TailaFox

Convention mascot bust, design by Moonlight

Scotaloo fursuit mask, by FurKig


In case you aren't able to attend the con, don't worry, our staff will be responsible for sending your reward, so you can recieve it at home.
We can also asure you that the products found here are exclusive, you won't be able to obtain them elsewere.


What if you don't reach the goal?

In the event that we don't reach the goal, we'll make the convention anyway as we're working so hard to make it happen. However, even the smallest investment  will help us is to offer you greater entretainment and better convention memories.


My income isn't enough for me to help you, but I'd love to take part.

Even if your income is low, you can start helping with very little and still get a reward, even your name would appear among the con's donnors and on the website.

If you really can't donate, we are also grateful, as you can still help us. You can spread the word, share this campaign on your social networks and make it reach other furries and bronies.

Also, if you live in Madrid, or you'll be staying there at the same time the con is taking place, you can volunteer to help us Here

Thanks for your support.


PERKS
----------

- 1 €: Leave your pawprint - Enjoy having your name on a big poster among all our supporters.
- 3 €: A little memory - Enjoy having your name on a big poster among all our supporters and get a badge with the cons logo.
- 5 €: A dedicated pack of hounds - Take home a full color din-A3 copy of the poster, signed by the artist behind it, and also, your name will be on the contributors poster.
-  12 €: Getting trendy ;) - Get a T-Shirt with our mascot and show it off at the con, your name will also be on the supporters poster.
- 15 €: Wild breakfast - Get our great cup wit Aleena chasing her breakfast, churros with hot chocolate, and make your breakfast more fun. You'll also get your name on the supporters poster
- 35 €: Field work - Let your favourite cards or you computer mouse feel alive over our mascots game-mat. And get ready to have fun and being on the supporters poster!
- 45 €: Adopt Aleena - There is a cute pony dressed up as a little lion ahead, what would you do? Adopt her obviously. Get an exclusive Aleena figurine and your name on the supporters poster.
- 45 €: Wild Aleena appeared! - While at the con, you might find this lovely pony getting close to you. Worry not, she just wants to be with you. Get her bust home to decorate your room. Also, you'll be on the supporters poster.
- 60 €: My little pack - Get a great pack including a badge, the poster, cup, t-shirt and game mat. Also, you'll have your name on the supporters poster.
- 160€: I want it all - Get a pack with everything , including both figures, Lion Aleena and Aleena's bust.  And you're name will be on the supporters poster.
- 250 €: Fills you with Determination - Depicting yourself with a Scotaloo ponysuit head, it fills you with Determination.Get a Scotaloo mask from FurKig, don't loose this chance, it's a one of its kide exclusive item. And of course, you're name will be big on the supporters poster.

story:
Hi everyone!

Before telling about my project I want to ask all who has come here if you either can or can't contribute please SHARE this page with your friends and give a like. Use the buttons in the left on the top of this page. Your sharing is very important for the more people hear about us, the more likely we are to meet our target. And also write your comments what do you think about my project. To write a comment go to the top of this page and click COMMENTS. Thank you!


My project

My dream and my goal is to open in Moscow creative workshop studio with showroom to design and sell clothes and accessories of wonderful african wax printed fabric.

I love creativity and I make some handmade things. That’s why it was easy for me to fall in love with the bright colors of CAPULANA - a cotton wax printed fabric with vibrant colors and various traditional African patterns. And as well with a creativity of Mozambican artists generally. The CAPULANA fabric (type of sarong used by Mozambican women) and all that are made of it inspired me to start designing clothes, accessories and interior decoration of this fabric and to introduce them to the Russian people. What I want is to show and tell Russians about Africa with my creativity and creativity of African artists bringing these vibrant colors with joy of life.

    


My story

Hello! My name is Yana Milima. I was born and raised in Kazakhstan, then my adult years was living in Russia. 3 years ago I married a Mozambican and came to live in Mozambique. This is a really beautiful land with a wonderful nature.

All pictures are taken by me

Now I live here for 2 years. Africa is a completely different world for Europeans. Much of the culture and mentality is totally incomprehensible and even perturbs you. The way of life is completely different. There is a lot of poverty here and very low standard of living.

BUT! You know what struck me here? These are people. Despite all the difficulties and hardships of life they are cheerful, open, somewhat childishly careless and radiate the joy of life. They are grateful for that little they have.

The second thing that struck me is the bright African colors with traditional fabrics called here CAPULANA.

In Mozambique every woman has and wears CAPULANA. But not only in Mozambique. It is widely spread also in other areas of south-eastern Africa. It can eather be used as a wrop-around skirt, dress or become a baby carrier on the back. In real exists much more way how it is used.

    

That's impossible not to fall in love with these colors.

So CAPULANA inspired me for this project.

Why i want to open my workshop studio in Moscow? Because it's a great city and a place where live many interesting and advanced people. In addition, I love Moscow. In Moscow there is a very interesting place. This is a former factory with a huge area which is now organized as a platform for creative people. You can see about this place here http://flacon.ru

  

This will be a great location for my workshop studio. At first I plan to invite 3 seamstresses who together with me will sew items in my designs and samples at the workshop. And also I plan to employ 2 sales representatives. For a start it will be several models of skirts, women's dresses, children's dresses, trousers, cooking aprons, decorative pillows, beach bags and sets of tableware. In the future we will expand our product range. Believe me I have hundreds of ideas for this.

Also with my project I want to contribute in the fight against a poverty in Africa. To do this I want to deduct a part of the profits in the communities which are engaged in helping children and women in Mozambique. I have found and selected 4 communities which engaged in helping Mozambican women and children. 

..............................................................................................................................................

Everything you buy from Studio CAPULANA will help feed a hungry child in Africa or help with scholarship or help with getting professional education for women in Africa. One more education is a one more future.

..............................................................................................................................................

What I am going to do in my workshop studio

The main my passion is skirts. But as well i plan to design many other things of this wonderful fabric like woman dresses, children's dresses, trousers, beach bags, accessories for a house and much more. Here are some samples of what I plan to design. These are just samples. But my ideas of design you will be able to see if you help me to achieve my dream.

   

                           

I am happy to accept all your ideas and suggestions on what you'd like to see or have from capulana. Write it in comments please! And any your questions, feedbacks and requests as well. 

I am in love with all African art. That’s why  in the showroom of my studio I want to put on a sale great items of talented Mozambican artists which are simply breathtaking and dazzling. Here are a few examples of such handcrafts which I love so much:

     

So wonderful, aren’t they? These photos I took when I visited the fair of handcrafts in Maputo, capital of Mozambique. I hope you will share my feelings. Russians will be able to get acquainted with the wonderful art of Africa and buy unusual gifts for themselves and for loved ones. And talented Mozambican craftsmen will get more money for their work as well.

The impact 

I’m passionate about my project. This is my dream of self-expression, creativity, independence, bringing a little more color and joy to people's lives. 

This is why your help is so important for me to achieve my dream.

What We Need  

I am raising 20000$ to open the workshop studio with showroom.

With this money I will be able to:

buy a wax fabric for a first run to fill the showroom, rent a room for a studio for the first 3 month, buy 3 sewing machines, buy needed trade and sewing equipment for the studio, buy sewing accessories, tags, labels, buy the items of African artists, hire 3 seamstresses and two sellers, order the signboard for the studio, pay online stores livemaster.ru and etsy.com, register legal entity, paid a photosession with a professional photographer, order a printing of catalogs, information flyers and posters about our helping part of the project and business cards to promote our project.

The planned opening time is October – November 2016.

What You Get

Depending on your donation you will receive: hand written postcard, my handmade extraordinary jewelry of leather to choose from, my handmade cute soft toys, bright beach bags of capulana, cooking aprons of capulana, midi or maxi skirt of capulana.

For 25$ you will get one of my handmade jewelry or toys to choose:

   

   
    

   

   50$ perk          100$ perk                250$ perk

  Tote bag + jewelry     + jewelry

    500$ perk                                  1000$ perk

 + jewelry    maxi skirt + tote bag + jewelry

The estimated delivery time is September - November 2016. 

What if I won’t raise the full amount

If I won’t raise the full amount? Well .... I will be grateful for all collected amount. Any amount that I will raise I will use to buy fabric and sewing equipment. If the funds will not be sufficient for the opening the studio, I'll sew and sell clothes through internet sites livemaster.ru and etsy.com with a worldwide delivery. I will also search for shops to place my clothes for sale. At any case the part of all my profits I will send to communities caring for children and women in Mozambique.

And for those who are still reading this and want to know more…..I want to tell more about why I want to help women and children in Mozambique.

Why and to whom I want to help?

"Safety and security don't just happen, they are the result of collective consensus and public investment. We owe our children, the most vulnerable citizens in our society, a life free of violence and fear."
~ Nelson Mandela

Mozambique is considered one of the poorest and least developed countries in the world. According to UNICEF (2010), in 2008/2009, 21.5 million people in Mozambique, 55% of the population live below the poverty line with about half a US dollar per day. According to the 2010 world development indicators, life expectancy from birth is about 50 years. The mortality of children under five years in Mozambique is the 16th largest in the world.

According to UNICEF (2010) one of two Mozambican children suffer from chronic malnutrition and it is responsible for 15% of infant mortality.

It is estimated there are 1.8 million orphans in Mozambique, of which 510,000 due to AIDS. Despite the efforts of the Ministry of Health of Mozambique, the situation of AIDS in the country is extremely serious (about 20% of the population carries the virus).

Access to electricity: 14% of the population (Ministry of Energy, 2010).

Despite having huge water resources, yet it has low water supply coverage (43.9%) and the majority of the rural population still consumes inadequate water.

62.4% without access to health services (the country occupies position 183 among 191 countries analyzed the density of physicians)

Unemployment: almost a quarter of the population is unemployed

Infant mortality: 90 deaths of children under one year per 1,000 live births (Brazil: 21 Russia: 10 Canada: 5 USA: 7)

Illiteracy 60% (but 25 years ago was 93% ...). The population has only 1.2 years of schooling

Proportion of population using sanitation services: 31% (2006).

The population is still predominantly rural, with agriculture basically subsistence.

A major problem is the incidence of HIV. In 2000 it was estimated that 12.2% of the adult population was infected, reaching 25% in some regions. Thus, there are more than 500 000 children lost their father, mother or both to AIDS.

43% of children in Mozambique still suffer from chronic malnutrition (UNICEF).

Samples of our donation help:

1.  With our donations we will help with Estimated Treatment in Mozambique:

Diagnosis and treatment of malaria

Treatment for nutritional recovery of undernourished children

Medical treatment for a child (includes worm to medications, ringworm, vitamin A megadose, ferrous sulfate and antibiotics if necessary)

Dental treatment for a child (includes prevention, caries restoration and tooth extraction if necessary).

2. Building with donations of funds Escolinha NGO Mission Africa Mutua. Work in the education and nutrition of 133 children aged 4 and 5 years of teaching reading, writing and developing educational activities.

3.   Maintaining a Nutritional Recovery Center in Samora Machel, Mozambique

Our donation will be very important!

4.  $10 = one school uniform for a child

$50 = scholarship for a year (includes uniform, tuition, exam fees and books)

$100 = scholarship plus transportation expenses to and from school for a year

$250 = one week of health training for the community

$500 = six months of business skills training for a community member

With a much larger donation helping to improve and/or build local schools and hospitals.

And many others helping projects!

What if you can’t help with a donation

Well…..it’s ok, don’t worry. You can help by sharing my story in your social networks or e-mail using especial indigogo sharing tools at the top of this page. At any case I would be grateful. Thank you!
story_txt:

Use the buttons in the left on the top of this page. Your sharing is very important for the more people hear about us, the more likely we are to meet our target. And also write your comments what do you think about my project. To write a comment go to the top of this page and click COMMENTS. Thank you!

story:
Access to a Quality Education for All

eAKASH was founded with the mission to provide everyone with access to a quality education. We are accomplishing this through the delivery of a unified digital platform which includes hardware (tablet), software (eReader & apps) and local content (eBooks & digital material) for students, teachers and educators. Our initial focus is on the underserved, developing countries of South Asia. We are starting in the countries where we can have the greatest impact. Our first pilot project is in Bangladesh.

Why Education? Why Bangladesh?

Education is a basic human right and a significant factor in the development of children, communities, and countries.

While Bangladesh is making significant progress in achieving 100% primary school enrollment, due to economic barriers, a large percentage of students drop out of school by the end of the 5th grade. Moreover, the lack of access to quality educational material and content is a very serious problem. The vast majority of students do not even have access to a simple dictionary, let alone any additional books or access to the internet for supporting contents.

Studies show providing school children with a full course of quality primary education can lift entire communities out of poverty and create positive changes that span generations. Based on World Bank (WorldBank.org) research, each additional year of schooling a child receives increases his or her hourly wages as an adult by 10-30%. n extra year of secondary school for a girl can increase her lifetime earnings by 15 to 25 percent, according to GlobalCitizen.org.



The benefits of education are not only economic. Education nourishes peace. Research from Educate a Child (educateachild.org) shows increasing access to primary education leads to a person becoming more active and engaged in their community. This can lead to stronger, more inclusive, and more stable communities. Across society, every year of schooling decreases a male’s chances of engaging in violent conflict by 20 percent according to Save the Children (savethechildren.org).

The eAKASH Platform

The eAKASH platform includes a tablet with over 500 pre-installed eBooks, eReader software, educational apps and local-language digital content to supplement traditional educational materials. The platform also provides digital content publishing tools including content creation software, digital rights management and a content distribution channel via the eAKASH.com web portal. Additionally, there are thousands of books, mostly free of cost, available on the eAKASH portal for download by anyone with an eAKASH tablet and eReader app.



The eAKASH tablet also comes with a pre-installed dictionary. With eAKASH, children will have immediate access to a dictionary and the internet where they can access Wikipedia, online courses, and educational resources such as YouTube and Khan Academy.

Our Crowdfunding Campaign

With the eAKASH platform, we are providing tools to change peoples' lives, lift them from poverty, and enable them to become productive global citizens.

The goal of our campaign is to raise $18,000 for a pilot project. Our project consists of two initiatives. The first is to provide eAKASH tablets and digital content to schoolchildren and teachers at the WE. School run by WE. Foundation in Dhaka, Bangladesh. The second initiative is to provide eAKASH tablets and digital content to children and teachers selected by donors. The two initiatives will enable us to learn more about the use cases and content requirements for school and home environments,



The money raised will be used to cover the cost of the tablets with existing content ($13,500, includes shipping, duties & customs charges), the purchase and/or creation of additional local-language content ($2,200) and the cost of implementing the pilot project ($800). The remaining funds will cover the crowdfunding fees, 

We need your help to kick-off a successful pilot project. The pilot project will enable us identify and focus our future development on areas that benefit students and teachers the most.

With your help, we can move our project forward and help change peoples' lives...and possibly change the world.

Thank you for your support.

story:
Please Help Me

After I attempted to expose bad practice at Individual Solutions SK providing care for vulnerable adults and the elderly, I have been subjected to continued harassment and abuse that persists today. I even attempted to get the GMB Trade Union involved so that I could have someone fighting my corner, but they refused to support me.

I turned to Manchester’s Employment Tribunal, in the hope that malpractice would be exposed. Key witnesses were prevented from giving evidence by an extremely hostile judge, who made personal attacks on me. They wouldn’t even hear a witness who had travelled 200 miles on my behalf. Instead, the tribunal ruled against me, despite documented evidence in support of my case. 

Many whistleblowers are threatened with cost orders, so they are forced to withdraw their case. I have been ordered to pay £5,000 in costs, but I won’t back down.I have received a recent email from Stockport Council legal team they are taking instructions to enforce the cost judgement.

 You can read the full story on my website www.olesi.com

Please help me pay the cost order I believe that the more we stand up and say that we will not accept this treatment, together we will send a "strong message" that we stand up against bullies and Injustice.

What's Needed 

Pay Individual Solutions SK and Stockport Council £5,000 as ordered by the Manchester Tribunal Court

If more money is raised I will pay court  fees approximately £3,600 and use the remaining money to campaign for a change in the law to protect whistleblowers like me, adults and vulnerable elderly and hope that by raising awareness of my case in the press, others will have the courage to fight.

What You Get

A perk depending on your contribution. As well as Self-achievement because of your help, change will happen now and other generations will benefit from your bravery. You will be part of history.

 “A change is brought about because ordinary people do extraordinary things.” “Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time. We are the ones we’ve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.” President Barack Obama

Please Sign My Petition

If you agree with me that vulnerable adults and the elderly deserve to be happy, receive reliable, regular visits from home support workers and carers and be treated to consistent, high quality care, then join me in saying yes to change.

Please sign the petition and join this movement for change, contact David Cameron, spread the word and together we can get the law changed so that no one is afraid to speak out. Together, we can improve the care received by vulnerable adults and the elderly.

https://www.change.org/p/prime-minister-david-cameron-support-vulnerable-adults-and-the-elderly-by-protecting-whistleblowers

Thank you for your support.

malpractice would be exposed. Key witnesses were prevented from giving evidence
by an extremely hostile judge, who made personal attacks on me. They wouldn’t
even hear a witness who had travelled 200 miles on my behalf. Instead, the
tribunal ruled against me, despite documented evidence in support of my
case. 
Many
whistleblowers are threatened with cost orders, so they are forced to withdraw
their case. I have been ordered to pay £5,000 in costs, but I won’t back down.I have received a recent email from Stockport Council legal team they are taking instructions to enforce the cost judgement.
 You
can read the full story on my website www.olesi.com
Please help me
pay the cost order I believe that the more we stand up and say that we will not
accept this treatment, together we will send a "strong message" that
we stand up against bullies and Injustice.
   What's Needed  
Pay Individual
Solutions SK and Stockport Council £5,000 as ordered by the Manchester Tribunal Court
If more money
is raised I will pay court  fees approximately £3,600 and use the remaining money to campaign for a change in the law to protect whistleblowers
like me, adults and vulnerable elderly and hope that by raising awareness of my
case in the press, others will have the courage to fight.   
What You Get

A perk depending on your contribution. As well as Self-achievement
because of your help, change will happen now and other generations will benefit from your bravery. You will be
part of history.


 “A change is brought about because ordinary people do extraordinary things.” “Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time. We are the ones we’ve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.” President Barack Obama

Please Sign My Petition


If you agree with me that vulnerable adults and the elderly deserve to be happy, receive reliable, regular visits from home support workers and carers and be treated to consistent, high quality care, then join me in saying yes to change.
Please sign the petition and join this movement for change, contact David Cameron, spread the word and together we can get the law changed so that no one is afraid to speak out. Together, we can improve the care received by vulnerable adults and the elderly.
https://www.change.org/p/prime-minister-david-cameron-support-vulnerable-adults-and-the-elderly-by-protecting-whistleblowers
Thank you for your support.

story:
About Us

High school students in the Philippines are hungry for computer knowledge, yet in many public schools the student-to-computer ratio is more than 100-to-1.  Reneal International Education Outreach has been providing technology solutions to public high school students and teachers in the Philippines for 9 years.  We are passionate about the power of technology to change lives. 

Reneal IEO provides computer systems to selected public schools free (FREE!). Each system (client-server with free Open Source software) is reliable, easy to maintain, and gives obsolete computers new life as thin clients.  The system is rich in on-board educational resources opening new worlds to students who may never have touched a computer.

Reneal IEO is committed to long-term sustainability through annual visits and on-going support and monitoring.  Fifteen public schools on the island of Cebu are already partners with Reneal IEO.

What We Need

Help us fund the Reneal IEO 2016 projects in the Philippines!  Five candidate schools have already been evaluated and selected. Two of the schools to be served were victims of Typhoon Haiyan in 2013.

Campaign donations will be used to purchase and ship 35 used computers, monitors, keyboards, and mice to complement the limited resources the schools already have.  Your contributions will allow schools that have a student-to-computer ratio of over 100-to-1 to give more of the critical hands-on time to students that is so essential to building solid computer skills.

Used computers, monitors, keyboards, and mice will be purchased from World Computer Exchange, a past and valued supplier of Reneal IEO.  Each desktop/monitor/keyboard/mouse set costs approximately $70, with per-unit shipping costs of approximately $30/set.  $3500 will provide 35 new seats in public high school computer labs, as well as giving obsolete hardware new life.

High Probability of Success

Check our our past and future projects at www.reneal.org.  Reneal IEO has almost a decade of experience working with schools and IT teachers in the Philippines, with a team in place to ensure sustainability of the projects we execute. 

Reneal IEO is a Guidestar Gold non-profit organization, committed to responsible, transparent operation.  We are a 501(c)(3) public charity, so all donations are tax deductible.

Other Ways You Can Help

Reneal IEO also accepts direct donations of used computer equipment that is still functioning.  We are proud to be a partner of the National Cristina Foundation and donations can be directed through them to Reneal IEO at https://www.cristina.org/partner-details/?partn....

story:
Proyecto Amigos de La Pájara Pinta

Mi nombre es Christian Jiménez.  Soy productor audiovisual especializado en producción de radio, televisión y espectáculos para niños.  Desde hace más de 20 años fundé el proyecto La Pájara Pinta, con el cual pretendemos llevar alegría a la niñez por medio de la música infantil tradicional y original.
Escogimos y creamos el personaje de La Pájara Pinta porque su mención remite a la niñez y a la música vivida por todas las generaciones actuales.

Nuestro trabajo en Televisión, Radio y Shows en todo el país, nos ha permitido la cercanía con los docentes y padres de familia de centros educativos pobres, quienes nos manifiestan la necesidad de espacios lúdicos, artísticos y culturales.

El proyecto Amigos de La Pájara Pinta pretende llevar de manera gratuita para 50 centros educativos en desventaja social.

 

Nuestros espectáculos propician momentos de sana convivencia.  Son válvulas de escape del estrés, las angustias y las tristezas con las que viven a diario los chiquitines en sus entornos. Vuelven a ser niños y disfrutan como tales.

Nadie más en Costa Rica está realizando un trabajo como este.  Es necesario llevarlo a cabo.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Para este proyecto necesitamos $25.000.  Estos fondos se destinarán a costear: 

  • La logística 
  • La coordinación administrativa, 
  • El  elenco artístico
  • el transporte, 
  • el equipo técnico, 
  • el personal técnico y de asistencia de producción.
  • la escenografía, 
  • y la producción del show musical en 50 lugares para impactar a más de 10 mil niños.
Con tu aporte podrás obtener reportes mensuales de testimonio y realización de actividades.   Podrías también obtener música del proyecto en mp3, CDs musicales de La Pájara Pinta, y Videos de las temporadas en Televisión.  Te encantará si tienes niños en casa o sobrinos que te visitan.
En caso de no lograr la meta total, realizaremos los shows que proporcionalmente podamos cubrir con los fondos obtenidos.

El impacto

Con tu contribución ayudas a que cerca de 10 mil niños en zonas muy pobres y en desventaja social tenga acceso a un espectáculo que nunca antes han visto de cerca.  Dadas las presiones y dificultades de los ambientes en los que viven, la mayoría de ellos ni siquiera han ido nunca al cine.  

Con nuestro proyecto los acercamos de forma vívida a las artes, a la música, a posibilidades infinitas de interacción lúdica que les permitirá tener una nueva cosmovisión de la sociedad, descubrir vocaciones y tener esperanzas de un futuro mejor y diferente a las limitaciones que viven en la actualidad.  Vuelven a ser niños y disfrutan como tales.

En el Grupo La Pájara Pinta hemos realizado este trabajo por más de 20 años.   Hemos llevado a más de 40 mil niños al teatro totalmente gratis con nuestros montajes teatrales La Pájara Pinta, Estaba La Pájara Pinta y La Pájara Pinta en busca del Sapito Dorado.  Todos ellos ganadores de Premios de Ministerio de Cultura.

Tenemos un programa de radio semanal sabatino desde hace más de 12 años (89.1FM) y un programa de Televisión desde hace un año por Canal 13.

Hemos sentido la necesidad de llegar a las poblaciones infantiles que tienen imposibilidad de acceso a espectáculos de primer mundo.   Tu ayuda será determinante y  hará posible el espacio para llevar una influencia positiva hacia nuestra niñez.

Serás testigo constante de los avances.

Retos y desafíos

Lamentablemente, ha sido difícil generar estos recursos a partir de empresas privadas o departamentos de Responsabilidad Social de las compañías comerciales.  Esto debido a que sus recursos están enfocados en que sus inversiones en la sociedad sean visibles y genere réditos en imagen,  posicionamiento y consecuentemente aumento de las ventas.
Por eso apelamos a personas y amigos cuya sensibilidad social sea pura, auténtica y desligada de cualquier retribución comercial.
Tenemos poco tiempo para lograr esta meta ya que el trabajo de pre-producción es arduo y demanda gran cantidad de tiempo y recursos.


Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Comparte con otros esta idea, colócala en tu muro de FB con el link del proyecto en Indiegogo, recomiéndanos, cuéntale a otros que ya colaboraste, cuéntale a otros que vas a colaborar, envíales un mail que lo dirijan al proyecto.  La gente se contagia por hacer el bien.  Cuéntale y cuéntale a todas tus listas de amigos. 

Comparte este link en todas tus redes sociales y comunicaciones:

http://igg.me/at/amigosdelapajarapinta

Ayudar a los niños es cambiar vidas y cambiar vidas es transformar el mundo.
